title: Ghost House Diamond Match
description:
ghost house diamond match

Solve match 3 puzzles and unveil the story of haunted houses! Adventures, riddles, unsolved secrets and mystical stories await you! You have to go through a lot of tests, solve many mysteries and reveal the veil of secrecy that enveloped the city. By revealing the secrets of the city you will be able to pass fascinating match 3 levels. Only then good will finally be able to triumph over evil.

More than 300 match 3 levels with unique mechanics that will not let you get bored!
Unique gameplay: explore mysterious houses and pass the match 3 levels.
Exciting alchemy — mix the magic ingredients and get magic potions.
Useful magic boosters will help you to pass difficult match 3 levels.

title: Snow Candies
description:
Snow Candies eğlenceli bir şeker patlatma oyunu. Oyun içerisinde bir birinden zorlu bölümler ile şekerleri patlatmaya hazırlan. Yollar kar engelleriyle kapalı yolları açmak zirveye ulaşmak için engelleri aşarak ilerle. Bölüm içerisinde şekerleri yan yana üst üste getirerek patlatabilir puanları toplayabilirsin. Her bölüm içerisinde hedef puana ulaşmalı ve bir sonraki levelin kilidini açmalısın. Oyun içerisinde ek hamleler alabilir aldığın hamleler ile bölümleri daha kolay geçebilirsin. Şeker patlatma oyunu ile hem öğrenip hem eğlenmeye hazırlanın oyun içerisinde ki şeker bulmacalarını çözerek daha eğlenebilirsin.
Snow Candies hemen oynamak için ücretsiz bir şekilde indirip oynayabilirsiniz..

title: tic tac toon
descriptionHTML:
tic tac toon is your new favorite puzzle game.

All you have to do is match three toon pieces of the same color on the tic tac toe board.

There are many toons for you. Each toon has a different difficulty.

Also known in the world as tic tac toe, noughts and crosses, noughts and noughts, jogo da velha, tateti, tris, triqui, tres en raya, color rings puzzle... Wich name do you like better?

+ you can play for free anywhere and anytime;
+ tic tac toon is suitable for all ages;
+ there is a different leaderboard for each toon;

Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game.

title: Safe Puzzles
description:
Totally new and very challenging puzzle game where your main task is to guess how to open a safe. You will have to use your logic and imagination in order to guess how the lock system works. This puzzle mechanics are simple, but unique enough to capture your interest. Try to unlock as many safes as you can at the shortest time. 

The gameplay is simple yet very challenging. Just use your device’s touch & drag functions to solve how to open a safe. With each level the task gets more and more sophisticated. But can this stop a professional safe cracker? To succeed you need to think wide. 


Features:
- A wide choice of various safe types 
- Simple gameplay yet very challenging
- Logic and imagination is required 
- Multiple difficulty levels
- Simple intuitive controls

title: Keto Krash - The Low Carb Match 3 Game
description:
You eat low-carb; now you can play low-carb! Start playing Keto Krash today - the ultimate game for Ketogenic dieters.

Switch and match Keto friendly foods in this puzzle adventure to progress to the next level of burning ketones! Fun and fiendish levels await you as you use your quick thinking and strategy to combine low-carb foods into tasty Keto combos! Mmmmm steak and cheese.

Plan your moves by matching 3 or more colorful foods in a row and using powerful Keto boosters to conquer complex levels. Defeat the carbs blocking your path to success and create your own Keto Journey.

title: Find the Differences 500 levels - Spot It
description:
Hello, difference detection genius! Enter the magical find the difference world and enjoy the land of fairy tales! The aim of find the difference game is to find differences between two very similar images.  If you like playing free puzzle games, you are surely going to love this “find the difference free” game 500 levels which we have created especially for you! Discover “what's the difference” between two pictures and spend hours of fun playing this spot it game! 

☑ Compare two pictures side by side to search for differences
☑ When you find the different object, tap on it as fast as possible!
☑ Difficulty of the game increases with levels!
☑ If you get stuck, use help: take a hint to see where the pictures differ!

Try the best game of Find the Differences 500 level – Spot the difference! 

	
🔎 500 beautiful levels to find the difference! 
🔎 Use hint to spot the difference from pictures!
🔎 HD pictures!
🔎 Variety of the stunning background themes!
🔎 Zoom, enlarge to see the images better!
🔎 No Internet connection required to play. Offline Game.
🔎 Hurry up and find differences now!

This will provide you with hours of fun and entertainment! Let the 2018 be the year of playing the best find the difference games! Find the difference in the pictures with most beautiful background themes and enjoy being the difference detection genius!  A special “find the difference game” will dazzle you with its excellent graphic design and intuitive touch screen controls! Can you spot the difference between two nearly identical images? Download this learning game free of charge and enjoy being spot the difference detective! Find the Difference 500 levels only for you! 

Excellent “difference game” for kids and adults! 

In this find the difference game you must find five differences in objects and landscapes between 2 images. Best find difference game in market. These “spot it games” are suitable for all generations of users – here are both spot the differences games for kids for adults!  This could become your favorite “find the difference free for kids” game which will help your kids enhance their concentration, focus and observation skills!  This fun brain teaser lets you use hints to see where the pictures differ! Find items in pictures in 500 levels, each with a different beautiful photo pair!

Every time you want to relax your busy brain you can play Find Differences free game with 500 levels!  Make sure to click on the pictures when you are sure about the difference otherwise your time will get shorter and you may not have enough time to find all 5 differences in the images due to misscliks. Find the differences before the time runs out without losing! Correct choices encircle the difference and incorrect touches deduct time, with the game ending if time expires on any level. Difficulty of levels gets harder as you progress in spot differences.  This is a fun learning game which helps everyone develop their visual perception! “Spot differences between pictures” and solve the photo puzzle! If you would like to improve your concentration, your cognition, and your ability to notice small details, go ahead and install this magical spot differences game with levels! 

Download Spot the Difference free game and share it with everyone! “Find the differences games” are excellent for playing in a pair – play these “find difference games” with your friend, family and relatives. Find the Differences 500 levels is a free puzzle game known as “Find the differences”, “Spot the difference” or “Find differences” where you look for differences between two images.You gonna love this game if you like games like find the difference and hidden objects series.

title: Kids Puzzles 😄 Jigsaw puzzles for kids & toddlers
description:
Jigsaw puzzles for Kids and toddlers! a puzzle game made for young kids, with beautiful hand crafted cartoon images. Simple mechanics and easy for your child to pick up and play. Parents may even find them self playing along side with your child. with over 2000 puzzles to solve and over 400 unique cartoon pictures / puzzles will keep you entertained!

Kids Puzzles has over 15 categories to choose from including Animals, Fairies, Cars, Unicorns, Dinosaurs, Cats & Dogs, Sea life, Farm, Beach, Bugs, Space, Transport, Princess, Superhero, and a bonus category, each with a huge amount of pictures and puzzles to solve. categories which suit boys and girls.

Develop your child's logic skills with this free educational classic game Kids Puzzles - Jigsaw Puzzles. with simple to difficult game modes including 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 5x5, 6x6 piece puzzles

At the completion of each puzzle, your kids get to pop balloons and earn stars in the best kids puzzle game. 

Progress is automatically saved as you go, so your child can always put it down and continue a puzzle later where they left off.

Features:
* Contains over 2000 puzzles, with 400 unique cartoon pictures, 2 free categories with Animals and Fairies with 65 unique pictures and 325 puzzles to solve.
* 5 play modes, 2x2 (4 piece), 3x3 (9 piece), 4x4 (16 piece), 5x5 (25 piece), 6x6 (36 piece) puzzles
* View / Hide the puzzle, and puzzle piece outlines.
* Parental control in settings.
* Runs smooth on Android tablets and phones

Jigsaw Picture Set Categories:
* Animal Puzzles (40 pictures free)
* Fairy Puzzles (25 picures free)
* Car puzzles
* Unicorn puzzles 
* Dinosaur Puzzles
* Cats & Dogs puzzles
* Sea life fish puzzles
* Farm puzzles
* Beach puzzle
* Bugs puzzles
* Space universe puzzles
* Transport, trains and planes puzzle
* Princess puzzles
* Superhero puzzles
* and a bonus category



Privacy Information:
As parents ourselves, Raz Games takes children's privacy and protection very seriously. We do not collect any personal data. This app does contain advertising as that allows us to give you the game for free – ads are carefully placed so kids are least likely to accidentally click on them. This app includes the option for adults to unlock or buy additional in-game items with real money to enhance game play and removing ads. You may disable in-app purchases by adjusting your device settings or in the app itself with our exclusive parental contol features.

If you're having any problems with this app, or would like any updates/enhancements, feel free to contact us at info@razgames.com. We would love to hear from you as we are committed to updating all our games and apps for the best possible user experience.

title: Connecting Lines
description:
A fascinating puzzle game that will be an indeal solution to fill your free time. This game requires your attention, concentration and a little bit of creativity. Your task is to connect all the points in one continuous line. In part, this game is similar to the Chinese game of Go, but here you have no rival except your own imagination.

The number of options is infinite, each time a new task is generated. The game is based on a logic.

Understanding how to play the game is easy and intuitive. Just draw the line to make your unique pattern. Playing the game is quite relaxing that is also attributed by the calming music in the background.

title: Candy Monsters Match 3
description:
- Puzzle and Match 3 Game
- 100% FREE content
- Simple and easy to play
- For all ages
- More than 100 challenging levels. All differents!
- High quality graphics and animations
- Boosts to get out of difficult situations
- Fun game experience.
- Multilanguage

Joins 3 or more monsters of the same color and use magical powers to break through hundreds of fantastic levels. But you will need your wit and talent to overcome the challenges and riddles that arise!

All the fun on your fingertips with the most fascinating puzzles you will ever solve!

Live the most incredible adventures that cross different lands, avoiding traps and solving the challenges that will increase and put to the test your way of reasoning and thinking

The levels have different objectives, and each one requires making the best decisions. There are levels that require you to earn many points and get stars, others collect candies, help the monsters escape from jelly or chocolates that have them trapped, even prevent the bombs from exploding.
Beware of the evil monsters that will try to block the board!. You must eliminate them and reach your goal.

You will have a time limit or number of movements to solve the puzzle in each case.

All these combinations turn the game into a fun hobby with infinite possibilities. You will be presented with new challenges that you will have to solve, sharpening your concentration and wit while you have fun!.

title: Brain Teaser For All Ages - Slicy
description:
Slicy is one of the best brain teasers games that help you improve its mental abilities to solve puzzles. It has 118 levels starting at easy levels and then moves to gradually difficult levels so it is suitable for children and adults.

How to play slicy:

1. Touch the screen and draw a straight line that separates the slices from each other.
2. Each one must carry only one bright spot.
3. You can click the "Hint" button to help you draw the first cutting line to separate the slices correctly. It is finding the first solution for you and you have to find the other solution.

Note that there is a limited number to use the hint button and the cutting lines you draw increase after a certain number of levels.

Please if you like our game, leave us a comment.

title: Happy Glass: Happy Cup
description:
The glass is sad because it's empty. Your job is to draw a line to make the glass filled up with liquid and smile again!

Try to find the best way to complete each level. You can come up with your own solution so be creative and don't be affraid to think out of the box!
Some levels might look easy but let's see if you can actually get the 3 stars.

Happy Glass - Happy Cup Features :
* Dynamic mechanism. Draw lines & use brain freely to complete levels!
The only thing you need to do is to “fill glass”
Will you be able to clear these simple-looking but actually difficult stages?

The rules are simple!
Let's bump the two balls
All you need to do to clear a stage is to 
“fill glass with ice cubes to make glass happy”.
Draw lines and shapes freely to move and roll the ice cubes.
Flexible thinking is going to become the key to victory.

When you hit the target with a ball, the target knocks down or explodes.
Achieve the stage score to clear then challenge the next level.
In this game you have to break piano glass tiles as fast as you can.You don't have enough time to think just tap tap on glass tiles and progress as much as can in happy glass tiles.

title: Best Escape Game 467 - Sunshine Escape Game
description: A sunset lived on a beautiful, magnificent planet. The sun was very bright. One day the sun is locked in a palace there. It is your duty to save the sun from there.  To save the sun from there you will find it helpful to find the hidden puzzles you have hidden there. You will be able to find the best of all the hidden mysteries and save the sun from there and congratulate you for winning the game. Though it's a little hard to find the puzzles and tricks, it stimulates the desire to find somehow.   Playing this game will get peace of mind and freshness. The game is very good for people with stress. Thanks for enjoying more and happy. Good luck and have a fun !

title: new Jump Helix ball 2018
description:
Jump Helix ball with crazy ball jump and very addictive gameplay. It's a fanny game, it helps you to relax.
How to play:
Playing Helix Jumps! 3D is simple. You put a finger on the screen and move it left to right to rotate the structure.
Score more points by going through multiple openings at once. 

FEATURES
- Easy to play
- 3D graphics
- Beautiful graphics


Features Category :
Helix
helix jump
helix jump game
helix loop jump
=========================
Jump Helix Ball avec un saut de balle fou et un gameplay très addictif. C'est un jeu de fanny, il vous aide à vous détendre.
Comment jouer:
Jouer à Helix Jumps! La 3D est simple. Vous mettez un doigt sur l'écran et déplacez-le de gauche à droite pour faire pivoter la structure.
Marquez plus de points en parcourant plusieurs ouvertures à la fois.

FONCTIONNALITÉS
- Facile à jouer
- graphiques 3D
- beaux graphismes


Caractéristiques Catégorie:
Hélix
saut d'hélice
jeu de saut en hélice
saut en boucle d'hélice
=========================
Jump Helix ball con crazy ball jump y un juego muy adictivo. Es un juego de fanny, te ayuda a relajarte.
Cómo jugar:
Jugando Helix Jumps! 3D es simple. Pones un dedo en la pantalla y lo mueves de izquierda a derecha para rotar la estructura.
Obtenga más puntos al pasar por múltiples aperturas a la vez.

CARACTERISTICAS
- Fácil de jugar
- Gráficos 3D
- Hermosos gráficos


Características Categoría:
Hélice
salto de hélice
juego de salto de hélice
salto de bucle de hélice
==========================
クレイジーボールジャンプと非常に習慣性のゲームプレイでジャンプヘリックスボール。これはファニーゲームで、リラックスするのに役立ちます。
遊び方：
Helix Jumpsをプレイ！ 3Dはシンプルです。画面上に指を置き、左右に動かして構造物を回転させます。
一度に複数の開口部を通過することにより、より多くのポイントを獲得する。

特徴
 - プレーしやすい
 -  3Dグラフィックス
 - 美しいグラフィックス


特徴カテゴリー：
ヘリックス
らせんジャンプ
ヘリックスジャンプゲーム
ヘリックスループジャンプ
=============================
Jump Helix Ball mit verrücktem Ballsprung und sehr süchtig machendem Gameplay. Es ist ein Fanny-Spiel, es hilft Ihnen, sich zu entspannen.
Spielanleitung:
Helix springt! 3D ist einfach. Sie legen einen Finger auf den Bildschirm und bewegen ihn von links nach rechts, um die Struktur zu drehen.
Erziele mehr Punkte, indem du mehrere Öffnungen gleichzeitig durchführst.

EIGENSCHAFTEN
- Einfach zu spielen
- 3D-Grafik
- Schöne Grafik


Eigenschaften Kategorie:
Wendel
Helixsprung
Helix Sprungspiel
Helix-Schleifensprung

title: Animal First
description:
Animal First,
It is a new concept puzzle game that connects animals and food so that cute animals can feed them as trainers.

Please send delicious food to lovely animals ~

▶ Play with me Event ◀
After play with friends, get a reward!
(If you want to see more information, check in-game banner.) 

■ Enjoy new puzzle rules you have not experienced before.
Intuitive gameplay that simply connects animals and food

■ Exciting levels and various levels and missions that are constantly added

■ various rewards, ability to play without restrictions if you have the skills

■ score leaderboard with all users in the world and friends in the infinite ranking competition

title: Royal cafe: Match3 and Time Management
description:
Play out a genuine rags-to-riches story! Make a young girl’s dream of having her very own  business come true as you beat tasty match-3 levels and serve food in a royal cafe.

Mary was distraught after losing her job, but Tobby, her dearest friend and helper, saw a notice that someone was looking for a new owner to run their old  cafe.
Now the girl has a lot on her plate: she needs to manage her diner, meet the most demanding tastes of her visitors and buy new stuff for her royal cafe!

Join Mary in this NEW  three in a row & time management game that's got it all on the menu!
- Follow tips and learn to cook MATCH-3 style with unique boosters and explosive combinations!
- Solve assorted colorful PUZZLES and win fresh food items

- MANAGE an old-time diner by filling orders as fast as you can
- Satisfy customers of all types: use STRATEGY to please impatient bruisers, whimsical girls, loyal visitors and even thieves
- UPGRADE your diner by adding stylish furniture and décor
- INVITE your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the cafe!

Enjoying our free-to-play game? Learn more about the game and play in the Facebook Gameroom!
Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to support@renatus.com 
Download "Royal cafe: Match3 and Time Management" and play!

title: Epic Bridge Builder
description:
Test your engineering skills with this brilliant bridge building game! You will be in charge to construct complicated bridges to achieve goals. You have to make bridges rigid but also cheap. Different materials will give you the opportunity of creating bright solutions. 

Take your time and build your best bridge, test it against different cars and find weak spots than fix them. You can save all your process and continue whenever you want to pass a good time. Also to get 3 stars on each level you need to come up with unique solutions.

There are 25 different level to test your bridge building skills. Each level has different difficulties and has different mechanics that you need to figure out. Also with sandbox levels you are not limited with budget. 

Game features:
- 25 challenging level.
- Realistic physics.
- Easy control, stress indicator for the materials, improved user interface.
- Varied cars to test your assembled bridge.
- Simple but bright graphics with nice relaxing background music.
- Multiple addictive levels in different environments.
- Magnificent sound effects.
- The distinctive logic required for every level.
- Weight changes for every cargo.
- With small size take less space on your phone/tablet.
- Optimized for older devices.

title: Color Ring Puzzle
description:
Match rings in same colors to score high!
Color Ring Puzzle is an easy, simple, classic puzzle game that can be enjoyed by everyone in family!

HOW TO PLAY
* Simply drag the given rings and put them into the grid.
* Remove the rings by making horizontal, vertical, or diagonal line has the same color.
* You can change given rings by using dustbin button.
* Try to remove multiple lines at a time to get higher score! :D

WHY Color Ring Puzzle
★ 100% FREE TO PLAY Suitable for family and all ages.
★ TRAIN YOUR BRAIN Stimulating brain game, highly entertaining for everyone!
★ EASY CONTROLS Extremely smooth touch control of rings in this free puzzle game.
★ STUNNING GRAPHICS Catchy sound effects with mesmerizing visuals.
★ NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy Color Puzzle anytime, anywhere!
★ PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS Compete with your friends and players all over the world!
★ NO TIME LIMITS! You can enjoy Color Puzzle at your own pace!

NOTES
• Color Ring Puzzle supports mobile phones & tablet PCs.
• Color Ring Puzzle contains ads varying from banners, interstitials, videos to house ads.
• Color Ring Puzzle is completely free to play.

Need Help? Have Questions?
We value your feedback! Please contact us at feedback.oceanbarque@outlook.com

title: Fill The Happy Water Glass Line Drawing Game
description:
Fill The Happy Glass Line Drawing Game is considered a drawing puzzle game where you have to solve a few Line Physics puzzles in the form of filling the glass with the water that comes from the tap using only the pencil lines and the obstacles that can also be used to you benefit, the game itself is quite simple to understand but it can be hard and challenging since this is a puzzle game of course, all you have to do is draw some lines or do a continuous line drawing, but not any lines you have to analyze the whole situation and all the surroundings before making any move.
Fill The Happy and Glass is a new Lines Drawing Game, it is so fun to play and it will actually challenge your thinking abilities and push your brain to the limits which is quite good and can be considered as a brain training game also, it has more than 100 different levels from easy to hard, you might get stuck on some levels that's why we've included a " Hint Button ", Click on it and it'll show you the perfect solution to fill the glass.
Line Drawing Games is gonna help you put your brain to work with this addictive line physics game, it's actually an awesome time killer because each puzzle can be solved in many creative ways.

title: Crossword by Virginia Lottery
description: This is the official Crossword app from Virginia Lottery! Crossword is Virginia Lottery’s classic word game where players match call letters to a crossword puzzle in an effort to reveal words. Players can play the Crossword game for fun – or players, who are at least 18 years of age, can enter into our second chance promotion! It is important to note that we do not accept wagers, bets, or payments of any kind through our website/apps and we only offer age-controlled products that are sold at authorized retailers within the state. Thank you.

title: Color Puzzle by Poly ArtBook
description:
Need to challenge your mind but relax ? Color Puzzle by Poly ArtBook is made for you!!!
Touch to complete variety artworks such as jigsaw puzzles!
Color Puzzle by Poly ArtBook is a brain training puzzle game that challenge you to arange a collection of polygonal puzzle pieces and complete beautiful artworks,
The game is public and easy for every one, help people relaxing with many of colorful pecies of trees or animals, that will give you a wonderful eye-catching visual satisfaction,
Otherwise, the game is a great way to teach your children or students how to recognize basic numbers, and it gives them the opportunity to develop a sense of beauty and artistic sense.

HOW TO PLAY:
Drag the polygon pieces and place them in correct place.
Identify the target area by number or outline.
Play as a jigsaw puzzle.

-  Many colourful puzzles

-  Boosters to make your painting faster and easier

title: Puzzlemix - Puzzledom all in one
description:
Puzzlemix is a collection of the most popular puzzle games in one game. You can play Connect, Escape, One Lines, Tangram, Blocks, Dots, Pipes, Unroll, Unblock, and Bridges all in one game for free. Very addictive and challenging puzzle games, made to train your brain skills.

If you are a fan of classic puzzle games, puzzlemix is the right game for you. The game combines all classic puzzles in collections that will keep your mind active and entertained. There are many mystery boxes and puzzle games that you must complete. Play all the best puzzle games available for Android with the Puzzledom game. Thousands of puzzle levels await you. 

Puzzle collection feature in one application:

+ CONNECT: connect dots of the same color, find unique paths by not crossing each other
+ ESCAPE: move the red block towards the exit, lots of colorful block obstacles
+ BLOCK: fill the entire board with various shapes of blocks by dragging blocks
+ TANGRAM: place the color blocks in the correct position
+ ONE LINE: connect all points with lines without interruption

More puzzles coming soon like:
- PLUMBER: connect the pipe perfectly
- ROPE: draw a line into a certain pattern
- TRACE: pass all blocks with one line
 
Note:
We try to keep adding puzzle games and more challenging levels. Be sure to always update your Puzzemix. Have fun :)

title: Slitherlink Mastery
description:
Slitherlink Mastery is an addictive logic puzzle game. We have been addicted to these puzzles for over 10 years now and decided it's about time to release an app of our own. Enjoy!

FEATURES
• 4 difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard and Master
• 5 puzzle sizes: 3x3, 7x7, 10x10, 15x15 and 20x20
• Over 10,000 randomly selected puzzles
• 4+ themes to suite your mood and taste
• Touch-screen pan and zooming
• Line colouring for long chains
• Double tap to mark empty spaces
• Undo, redo, reset and replay buttons
• Instant error indications
• Stats and high scores system

A 'master' difficulty can be unlocked with an in-app-purchase for the most hardcore of puzzle solvers. If you're enjoying Slitherlink Mastery you can support us by unlocking this mode.

Enjoy!

Welcome to the World of Legend Stone, a simple but challenging casual puzzle game!

There are countless legend stones with infinite energy shuttling in the Universe. Drag these stones with different shapes into a full line vertically or horizontally, they will disappear. Then you can get infinite energy and these stones will become shinning stars scattering in the vast universe. Believe us, you’ll be obsessed with these amazing legend stones as well as the mysterious infinite universe!

Fully enjoy yourself in Legend Stone at your spare time, the best way to have a relax and gain pleasure.

title: Conceptis SumSudoku
description:
SumSudoku, also known as Killer Sudoku, are addictive logic puzzles best described as a cross between Sudoku and Kakuro. Using pure logic and simple add/subtract calculations, these fascinating puzzles offer endless fun and intellectual entertainment to puzzle fans of all skills and ages.

Each puzzle consists of a 9x9 Sudoku grid containing areas surrounded by dark borders. The object is to fill all empty squares so that the numbers 1 to 9 appear exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 box, and the sum of the numbers in each area is equal to the clue in the area's top-left corner. In addition, no number may be used in the same area more than once.

The game includes helpful features such as showing possible sum number combinations in an area and pencilmarks to make temporary placement of numbers in the grid.

For more fun, Conceptis SumSudoku includes a Weekly Bonus section providing an extra free puzzle each week.

PUZZLE FEATURES

• 90 free SumSudoku puzzle samples
• Extra bonus puzzle published free each week
• Multiple difficulty levels from easy to very hard
• Puzzle library continuously updates with new content
• Manually selected, top quality puzzles
• Unique solution for each puzzle
• Hours of intellectual challenge and fun
• Sharpens logic and improves cognitive skills

GAMING FEATURES

• Concurrently playing and saving multiple puzzles
• Puzzle library sorting and hiding options
• Portrait and landscape screen support (tablet only)
• Pencilmarks feature for solving hard puzzles
• Show possible sum combinations option
• Lock number on keypad option
• Highlight Excluded Squares option
• Unlimited Undo and Redo
• Show conflicts during gameplay
• Check puzzle
• Track puzzle solving times

ABOUT

Conceptis SumSudoku have also become popular under other names such as Killer Sudoku, Sumdoku and Sumoku.  All puzzles in this app are produced by Conceptis Ltd. - the leading supplier of logic puzzles to printed and electronic gaming media all over the world. On average, more than 20 million Conceptis puzzles are solved each day in newspapers, magazines, books and online as well as on smartphones and tablets across the world.

egypt match 3

Here in Cairo, it is your job to oversee the management of the jewels within the pyramids. Most importantly you must organize them from the vast wealth that flows in from all corners of the kingdom. title: Paint by numbers - Coloring Book
description:
Paint by numbers and relax with one of our newest coloring games for kids and their parents. Pick from hundreds of various categories of pictures to color by number for adults and children or use a full pallet in the painter mode. Create your masterpiece in our coloring book by numbers and share it with friends and people around the world.

 Features of our painting games: 

Hundreds of pictures for any taste
New pictures every week
Color by number in different modes
Anti stress coloring
Share progress and pictures

 Get new pictures every week 

The collection of pictures of our painting games for kids, toddlers and adults is constantly updated. Enjoy new images every week and color them by numbers. Don’t worry about running out of pictures to color by number : there’s plenty of them coming every week.

 Choose painting modes 

You can paint by numbers in two different modes : tapping and dragging. There can always be complicated pictures in painting apps — that’s exactly the case to use the taping mode. And when the accuracy is less important, switch to dragging for faster painting by numbers.

 Use the full palette 

Get as much room for imagination as you can in coloring games for adults and kids with a painter mode. In this mode, you can use every colour you want and paint any pixel with it — just like in original painting games for girl and boys. Create your unique pixel work of art!

 Pick you favorite pictures 

The picture collection of our painting apps includes hundreds of colorful images in various categories:

Animals, insects and birds: zebras, cats and dogs, wolves, elephants, butterflies, owls, horses and ponies, snakes, deers, pandas, bunnies; 
Cartoons, anime and fantasy: dinosaurs, unicorns, robots, superheroes, dolls in dresses, evil vampires, dragons; 
Folk patterns, tattoos and paintings: mandala, celtic, german, japanese, gothic, house facades, skulls, faces, graffiti,; 
Vehicles: airplanes, trucks, cars; 
Nature: ocean, space roses and other flowers;

 Relax and destress 

Coloring games for girls and boys are a great way of coping with stress and relaxing. Pick you favorite image category, set the preferable difficulty level and spend hours chilling and unwinding. You can play our color games offline without wifi or internet connection anywhere you want. 

 Share with friends 

Whether the coloring was hard or simple, the result is always worth showing to someone. Our painting apps allow you to share you artworks with you friends via social media with just a couple of touches. Paint by numbers hundreds of images and pack them all together in your own coloring book. 

Download the newest of our paint games and make your own coloring book filled with art works!

title: Fire boy and Water girl Maze Puzzel
description:
Fireboy and Watergirl is a puzzel game you have to use both hand to solve. 
Help Lavaboy and Icegirlfind the exit through the maze. Lavaboy must avoid the water and Icegirl must avoid the hot lava.

Hints:

Watergirl and Fireboy continuously find themselves in mysterious temples, each time trying to get out of them. To escape they must solve puzzles and collaborate with each other. You can either play alone and move each character at a time or try to move them together at the same time. But it is much more fun to play the game along with a friend or a sibling, so that each is playing as a different character. Some people confuse and think that the game is called a waterboy and firegirl or a child of water and child of the fire).

In each temple the boy and girl must run and jump between fire and water, you should know that Fireboy is immune to fire, so he can step freely in pools of boiling lava, but he must be careful from stepping into water. Watergirl is resistant to pools of water, but gets hurt when stepping in the lava. Both charachters should beware of any other puddle on the way (green or black). At each screen the goal is to get to the doors which will lead you to the next room in the temple. The Fireboy should come to the door marked in red and the Watergirl should find her way to the door marked with a blue sign. On their way, both characters should collect diamonds that have the same color as themselves. In stages marked with a diamond, both girl and boy should collect the green diamond. The faster you get to the doors of each screen the higher score and ranking you will get.

title: Word Cook Fever
description:
Word Cook Fever is a new crossword word puzzle game designed to train your brain with plenty of challenging levels! 

Word search is perfect for both word connect and crossword puzzle games FANS- Come and test your vocabulary and puzzle solving skills and start your daily brain training NOW!

The aim of the game is to find all of the hidden words from the letters on the pan. Words can be vertical, horizontal, diagonal and even backwards, so don’t hesitate to look every way.
Start playing Word Cook Fever and become a trained word chef. 


Learn How to Play Word Cook Fever:
• Slide & drag your finger over the words to solve the puzzles. Keep in mind that the game gets trickier as you progress! 
• Words can be vertical, horizontal, diagonal and even backwards.
• Simply swipe your finger over a word on the cookie pan to select it.
• If you find a valid word that is not on the board, it will go to the “extra words” jar.
• Search to find as many words as possible to unlock levels and earn extra bonus coins.
• Fill in every block with a word! Earn coins when you discover star words.
• Have difficulty connecting the letters? You can use coins to buy a hint to help solve the level.
• Test your cooking skills while connecting the letters.    
• There is no time limit, so use your time wisely to find new words at your own pace!
If you enjoy a good challenge, Word Cook Fever is the best game for you! Embrace your brain power to discover and swipe the words on the cookie pan, complete the challenges, and win coins as you advance.
 
Look carefully to find all the words in the given letters, and connect them to create the hidden word! Heads up: It starts off as an easy word game and becomes challenging! You will have fun improving your vocabulary and spelling skills when playing this crossword game.

★ Discover hidden words by connecting the mixed letters.

title: Bubble Shooter - Panda Pop
description:
Bubble Shooter Instructions
The video game Bubble Shooter probably got this famous as it is very intuitive and easy to learn. It's some kind of mix of "Bubble Shooter" and "Connect Four" - that is probably why it's so easy to get into the game. Some notes on the rules and how to control the game:

The aim of Bubble Shooter is to collect as many points as possible. To get points you need to destroy the colored bubbles. In order to burst those bubbles you need to row/connect at least three bubbles of the same color.

In the bottom center of the gaming window you will find an arrow. You can change to direction this arrow points to with your computer mouse. Every time you click the left mouse button you will fire a new bubble to the current direction of the arrow.

Bubble Shooter Tips & Hints
Every time you shot 6 new bubbles, a new row of bubbles will be added to the top.
The game ends if a ball reaches the bottom border.
You can use the left and right border to bounce new balls in more advanced angles.
Bubbles which get separated from the rest, will burst as well.
In the lower left side you will the see the upcoming bubble.
There is no "final end" in Bubble Shooter - the goal is to collect as many points as possible.

One of the best casual games so far!

Bubble Shooter is such an intuitive game that it takes just seconds to get started. Long time motivation is guaranteed and the high scores is an additional motivation booster. all in all: Bubble Shooter is an awesome game!

title: True Hacker: Puzzle Quest
description:
We present to your attention a logical puzzle in which you will come across a multitude of various riddles and logical problems.

title: Taken Souls: Blood Ritual
description:
Enjoy a steampunk adventure set in Victorian London. Take on a role of a detective to solve a mystery whodunit. Search for hidden objects and solve puzzle mini-games.

London, 1860s. A series of brutal ritual murders strikes the city. Crime scene investigation gives nothing, as the culprit never leaves a trace. The criminal case is closed and buried in the secret archives. Twenty years later the reaper is back, and a cunning detective from a homicide squad takes over the case. Help him solve the murder mystery in this spine-chilling hidden object adventure game.

TRY THIS GAME FREE AND UNLOCK FULL VERSION FROM WITHIN THE APP

Key features of this free-to-download HOG:
- Mystery adventure set in gloomy London streets 
- Peculiar steampunk art and cinematic cutscenes
- Hidden object scenes with morphing items
- 30+ puzzles and skill-based games
- Hidden collectibles and upgrades
- Your choices affect the story!
- Professional voiceovers
- Badges for playing HOS and mini-games
- Discover alternative Match 3 mode
- Photograph mystical events and discover secret files

If you are thrilled with penny dreadful stories of Jack Reaper, this dark detective game is sure to grab your attention all at once. In the age of invention, use various tools to chase down the villain. Find hidden clues with UV-lamp in every location and trade collectibles to upgrade your searching skills. Run forensic analysis of all evidence with a unique brain-teaser minilab, and then pin them to your blackboard build theories and progress with the investigation.

Struggle to untangle a web of deceit in a city where everyone has something to hide. As the rumors about a secret society are spreading around, you are to harness you finding games skills to reveal the conspiracy. Expose a corrupt policeman, an obsessed millionaire and his bloodthirsty hound to save your wife from becoming the final victim. From the opening intro till the final cutscene this noir detective will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Enjoying Taken Souls: Blood Ritual? Learn more!

Facebook: http://facebook.com/Absolutist.games
Website: http://absolutist.com
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTPgyXadAX_dT4smCrEKqBA
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/absolutistgames

Questions? Contact our tech support at support@absolutist.com

title: Slice Puzzle – Fun Puzzle Solving Game
description:
Slice Puzzle is a puzzle solving game which combines slices into circle. Drag with your finger, puzzle with your logics. Addictive and fast-paced gameplay, easy and clear rules will bring you a memorable game experience. Keep splice and crush all pieces for fun!

HOW TO PLAY
There is a total of 6 circle areas and three candidate circles below. Drag slices in the circles below into the upper game area for splicing. Successfully forming a circle, there will appear a pop effect. Slices are randomly generated. The game goes to the end when there is no space to place.

Key Features: 
★Fun and easy to learn and play
★Unlimited game levels free to play
★A variety of graphics generate randomly
★The test between eyesight and brainpower
★Brief flat design for the overall interface
★Free revive function helps you play joyfully
★No time limit, pause or start at anytime
★Plenty of games give you endless pleasure
★No age limit, simple and addictive gameplay
★Fast-paced gameplay make you exciting

Slice Puzzle aims to combine parts into a whole. There are 100+ graphics generated randomly, giving you a new visual experience in every round, without feeling burnout and visual fatigue. In the process of game, you need to cooperate eye with the brain, and challenge the high score!

Addictive game settings, simple and clear rules make you easy to get started and enjoy the game experience. Once you start, you can't stop! Follow the fan-shaped pieces, constantly surpass yourself and get a new record of higher scores!

Turn your brain and think about the way you want to piece together. Hope you have fun and enjoy in it!

description:
Enjoy the fun tapping game for free, solve all the puzzles and Tap This! Pop the blocks, unlock boosts and power-ups and create huge explosions!

Get ready to experience the most exciting tap 2 puzzle adventure through hundreds of colorful levels filled with awesome challenges and brain teasers. Test your strategy and color-matching skills in this amazing tapping game, match cubes, crush toys and win. 

Tapping games are simply the best, and you can play them for hours. So you better hurry up and download Tap This! to start the most fun puzzle adventure. You can explode toys all day long, no wifi or internet connection is needed. Tap, blast and crash blocks in the best tap 2 game as long as you want - it's a free game to play and totally addicting!


Enjoy the Fun Blast Game
Tap on any 2 adjacent tiles of the same color to blast them. The more cubes you pop at one move, the better the chance you’ll unlock a cool booster that will help you defeat the challenges. Solve all the fun tap 2 puzzles, master the challenges and win cool rewards. Plan your moves to achieve the level target and clear the board. 


Tap This! Game Features:
Free to play cube blasting game. Fun game for everyone! 
Simple and addicting gameplay, easy to learn but challenging to master.
Hundreds of fun levels filled with awesome puzzles.
Cool game to play with family and friends. Play now and compete for the top scores.
Exciting blast puzzle adventure!
Beautiful graphics and designs, colorful settings and effects. 
Amazing prizes and free gifts. Enjoy the most fun toys game and pop the bricks. 
Powerful boosters to help you blast through the levels.


Set off on a blast fun adventure with Tap This! free tap 2 game and train your brain with plenty of fun puzzles and challenges. Matching cubes is the best way to relax and pass the time!


Use Fun Boosts
Tap 5 or 6 cubes to get a rocket.
Tap 7 or 8 cubes to get a bomb.
Tap 9 cubes to earn a color wheel.
Combine the different boosts to get bigger effects.


PLAY NOW this awesome puzzle blaster and enjoy this cute toys game with your family and friends!

title: Word Sandwich
description:
Hungry? Fill up with word sandwiches!

Make sandwiches by finding the correct connecting word (middle of the sandwich) that creates 2 separate compound words or phrases. The connecting word should complete the 1st word and start the 2nd word. 

Note: The compound words may be open (as in “ice cream”) or closed (as in “notebook”)

Collect coins to get hints, share to ask for help from friends, or skip to the next sandwich. For every 10 sandwiches you get right, you advance to the next foodie level and unlock a delicious new recipe! Build your cookbook with mouthwatering recipes for vegetarian and meat meals, special breads, and desserts!


Bon appetit!

title: Animatch 🐱 the cutest matching game 🍒
description:
Cute beasties rocked the boat and now they need your help! 🐾

Visit beautiful islands 🏝 and restore their lost colors. Friendly animals will accompany you during the trip 🐱 – take care of them and they’ll return a favor for sure. 

You’ll have tons of fun at various boards full of colorful jellies. Match them in patterns and combos, use spectacular boosters, and make use of your pupil’s powers. Complete all the levels to color the land of Animatch 🌸. 

Dive into a match-3 game full of positive vibes 🐨. Travel all over an archipelago of exotic islands and play the way you like. Unleash the power of the magic elixir and solve all the puzzles. 

⭐️ A friendly and colorful game for all the family
⭐️ The next level of match 3 puzzle games
⭐️ Name your in-game pets!
⭐️ Lots of levels to complete – many hours of pure fun!
⭐️ Free to play

title: Eat All Cookies
descriptionHTML:
Eat All Cookies is an IQ test puzzle game. You need to design a precise route to help the monster eat all the cookies in order from small to large. Otherwise the route design will fail and you can't help the monsters eat all the cookies. At the end of each level, you will have different IQ bonuses.

Advantages:
Totally FREE, WHITOUT any in-app purchase;
More than 600 extremely well-designed puzzle, all for FREE;
Easy to play, but some puzzle stage is really difficult and Challenging!

Cute monsters are your firends, help them to eat all the cookies in stage.Come on, Let's take a look at how much your IQ is?
summary: An IQ test puzzle game，with cute monsters in stage.

title: What's Cooking? - Tasty Chef
description:
Tie your apron and sharpen your knives – it’s time for a crazy cooking adventure in WHAT'S COOKING? - Tasty Chef! Starting as an amateur cook with a small kitchen, you’ll combine ingredients to create over 700+ recipes and serve delicious dishes to hungry customers. Customize your restaurant, upgrade your kitchen and improve your skills to become the world’s greatest master chef!

WHAT'S COOKING? – TASTY FEATURES
⦁ Combine ingredients to discover and cook 700+ recipes
⦁ Customize your restaurant and kitchen with unique themes
⦁ Level up your chef to unlock new ingredients and recipes
⦁ Upgrade your kitchen with new equipment
⦁ Visit the market and play mini-games to get common, rare or epic ingredients
⦁ Cook your diners’ favorite dishes for extra rewards!
⦁ Become a master of the kitchen and cook 5-star dishes!

SOURCE THE BEST INGREDIENTS
Part of any chef’s job is to find the highest quality ingredients available! To cook the best dishes you’ll have to visit the market. But there’s a catch - you’ll have to win your ingredients in a card game. You are given 10 attempts to flip over cards and discover the ingredients you want, try not to lose… you need ingredients to cook with!

COOK & DISCOVER OVER 100+ RECIPES
As you level up your chef you’ll unlock delicious new recipes and ingredients to find at the market. With so many combinations available, there are over 100+ amazing dishes to discover! Have fun to combine ingredients and discovering brand new dishes to serve to your hungry restaurant diners.

UPGRADE YOUR RESTAURANT
When you serve delicious food to your restaurant diners, you’ll earn coins – you run a business, after all! Why not spend these coins on upgrading your restaurant and kitchen? Unlock a variety of new kitchen tools to cook faster and better dishes, or customize your restaurant with new themes which give EXP bonuses to certain dishes!

BECOME A MASTER CHEF!
Level up your chef by earning EXP and cooking some amazing food in your bistro, or invest some coins in training. To become the world’s greatest master chef you need to master each ingredient and learn to cook 5-star food – are you ready for the challenge?

READY FOR A CRAZY COOKING ADVENTURE? DOWNLOAD WHAT'S COOKING? - TASTY CHEF TODAY!

title: Emoji Bumper
description:
Emoji Bumper is an interesting brain-training puzzle game. All you need is to try everything you can to make two emoji (👦 👧) balls bump with each other ( 👩‍❤️‍👨 ) by drawing lines or shapes.  🖊️

The emoji balls and other objects(like lines or shapes) you draw will naturally fall from higher to lower places. You may take a few trials before handling the rules, but you will definitely be obsessed in this little "magical" world of physics. You should think carefully before you draw lines/shapes because everything might be totally different than what you thought. 😲


🌟 FEATURES 🌟 
- Hundreds of Interesting Puzzles (more levels are on the go)
- Increase Your Flexible Thinking (try to pass levels in different ways)
- Challenge to Find Best Solutions (test your limit of intelligence)
- Cute & Diverse Emoji Expressions (emoji balls' faces are various)
- Use Your Pen & Ink Properly (infinite draws with limited ink)


📧 CONTACT US 📧
support@emojibumper.freshdesk.com


It's one of the most ADDICTIVE & INTERESTING puzzle games you would ever play. 😏
Once you learned how to play it, you must love to enjoy every bumping moment of the two emoji balls. Download it for FREE now and draw lines/shapes with your talents! 😘

title: Basics in Education and Learning:Scary School Room
description:
When was the last time you were scared? Now is the time when you have to be afraid and worry about yourself so that Basics does not scare you.

You are in a locked room. There are 3 doors and you need to determine which one to go. Look for tips on the floor under the objects, on the walls, on the doors. When you find out which door you need to go, you will find the key to it and go on.
Pass as many rooms as possible and do not make mistakes, otherwise Basics will punish You in their possessions! You have 3 minutes to leave the room, otherwise you will lose and have to start again.

A unique game where you need to go as many rooms as possible to become a leader among the players.

Features of the game Basic Fear: Basic Loop Room Education and Learning:

- an eerie atmosphere
- scary sounds
- logical tasks
- Basics , who can come out at any time

Experience the horrors of the dark rooms in which Basics lurks. Be careful and go as far as possible.

title: Jewel Super World I
description:
Jewel Super World I is the most puzzle jewel matching games with hundreds well designed levels for all users.
Best experience, graphics and puzzles will make you fully entertained in this match-3 game.

This game is completely unique with other match 3 games because this game let you make matches by moving jewels to solve puzzles.

Game features: 
● Complete different targets to win the level before you run out of time. 
● Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master. 
● Acres of luscious levels to complete. 
● Take on your friends to compete for the best score and see who can switch their way to the fattest onions ever! 
● Rechargeable boosters, extras and special power-ups to help with those challenging levels. 
● Discover precious in Egypt style graphics.

Jewel Super World I interesting game elements:
● Turn all blocks golden to finish a level.
● Rocks: simple obstacles that can be easily cleared by matching nearby.
● Snowballs: you will get snow balls by matching nearby a snowman.
● UFO: you have to match twice nearby a UFO to collect it.
● Spread ice: you should clear spread ice ASAP or the ice will spread out and cover your jewels.
● Black hole: there are block holes which you can drop useless jewel into. This will be a great help when you solve puzzles in the corner.
● Carriage: when you match nearby a carriage it will make a flying wheel in the oppsite direction to help you collect jewels in a row or colum.
● Big snow monster: please match nearby a snow monster as less as you can. Or it will invoke a huge snow monster attack you with spread ice.
● Windmill: when you match nearby a windmill you can color a leaf of the it with the color of jewels you matched. A windmill can be collected when all of its leaves a colored.
● Wolves: You can match nearby a wolf to clear it. But if you don't it will blink to another position on your board.
● Ice well: Unfortunately ice well can not be destroyed. It will make spread ice every round after you match.
● Dart: Dart will help you collect a jewel when you make a match near it. It is a really great help.
● Of course there are many other more elements waiting you to discover.

Play Jewel Super World I today and join millions enjoying the latest touch craze!
If you love diamond games or jewel match games, we're sure you will love this "Jewel Super World I". 
If you don't like jewel type mania games, we still suggest you try this one. The strategy & skills inside will make you excited.

title: Jewels Star 2020
description:
Your mission is to win Jewels Star, pass the levels and try to get all stars in each level.

How to play:
1: Match 3 or more identical jewels.
2: Match the jewels until the board transparency,the Jewels star will appear.
3: Make the jewels star down to last line to pass the level.
Tips: Eliminate the jewels quickly can get extra scores.

Features:
- More than 300 levels and 8 pretty scenes in the game, including starry sky,mountains,snow world and so on.
- Match 4 jewels can win the jewel's bomb and 1 lighting.
- Match 5 jewels can win color-changing jewels and 2 lightings.
- Eliminate 20 jewels continuous can win 1 lighting.
- The jeweled bomb can eliminate the jewels around.
- The Color-changing jewel can eliminate to any other colored jewel.
- The Timing Jewel can extend the playing time.
- The lightning Jewel can eliminate jewels in one row.
- For the chained jewel,you can eliminate the jewels around to unlock it.
- For the frozen jewel,you can eliminate the jewels around to release it.

If you like our game, please review it. 
Thank you !

title: Shisen Sho Mahjong Connect
description:
A simple game that matches the same figured tiles to remove.

[How to play]
- Only the tiles on the same side or the next side can be matched and removed.
- Tiles blocked by obstacles cannot be matched and removed.
- Remove all tiles and the stage is cleared.

[Features]
- Easy and simple control 
- Many stages
- Player support system: hint function
- Powerful supportive items provided

title: Learn Animals - Kids Puzzles
description:
Learn Animals Kids Puzzles is an educational game with cute animals for all ages. Our jigsaw puzzles are suitable for children of all ages
Playing this educational baby puzzle game will help your kids to improve their recognition skills while having fun.

Everybody loves puzzles and want to play with animal toys like dinosaur, baby elephant, kangaroo, lion, cow, giraffe, zebra, panda, monkey, crocodile, penguin, squirrel, dog, cat, cammel, tortoise and more


Features of Learn Animals Kids Puzzles:
- More than 16 cute animals in this jigsaw game: baby elephant, dinosaur, monkey, kangaroo, lion, cow, cat, dog, giraffe, zebra, panda, crocodile, penguin, squirrel, cammel, tortoise and more
- jigsaw contains 4 difficulty modes
- High quality pictures with animals
- Learn to recognize animals
- This jigsaw game for children is 100% Free 
- Use help if you want to see some blocks placed, simply click the plus button and it will drag n drop to interlock the correct blocks
- Undo last moves any time
- Support for smartphones, tablets and all types of screen resolutions

This jigsaw puzzle game is a free educational game where everyone can solve puzzles wtih cute animals. 
Both, boys and girls will love this animal puzzle pieces jigsaw game.

For more fun check out our other cool, fun and educational games for babies, toddlers, boys and girls! We create with love & care. Cryptic messages. Hidden clues. Secret societies. This is the Minneapolis Institute of Art as giant puzzle room, a museum mystery you can solve with the Riddle Mia This app. Use the app to search for clues in the artworks and expose a secretive faction of anti-technologists.

title: My Juice Bar: Match 3 Puzzle Fruit Farm
description:
Get ready to solve fun and challenging match 3 puzzles! Make your own fresh and delicious fruit juice and sell it to customers to earn money. Grow your business and have fun playing the most entertaining fruit farm game ever - My Juice Bar!

🍒 MATCH THE FRUITS & MAKE JUICE
Experience the thrill of having your own business and have fun with solving match 3 puzzles. My Juice Bar takes you on an endless adventurous match 3 journeys, full of tasty fruits, fresh juice, cool boosters and tons of fun features! Swap to match the fruits on your farm game, collect them to make and sell your juice to customers. Tap to match 3 or more of the same fruits and play this amazing match 3 game anywhere and anytime!

💰EARN MONEY & GROW YOUR BUSINESS
Have your own juice bar and satisfy your thirsty customers in the best match 3 puzzle game ever! A lot of customers in the queue are waiting for your juice. Collect materials from your farm and make the fruit juice. Add fruit to your machine and start selling it to people to earn cash. Grow your juice bar business and have hours of fun with this awesome fruit farm game!

💰WIN SCORES & CHALLENGING LEVELS
Not only that you’ll enjoy playing a great match 3 game, but you will also challenge your match 3 skills with thousands of addictive levels. Unlock new cool features, get rewards non-stop and upgrade your fruit farm business. Discover new delicious juices, meet new customers so your business can grow faster. My Juice Bar is not your regular and classic match game – it is a unique experience for players of any age!

Get My Juice Bar for FREE and enjoy!

title: Troll Face Quest Horror
description:
Do you like scary movies? Are you in the mood for a few jump scares? If so, then get ready to find out what terrifyingly hilarious pranks are waiting for you in Troll Face Quest: Horror.

This edition of the popular game series is stuffed full of references to many of your favorite horror films, TV shows, and even video games!

SOME TRULY FREAKY FEATURES

- Lots of brain-teasing puzzles that are both horrifying and hysterically funny!
- Bizarre and totally hilarious pranks based on famous moments from history’s most unforgettable horror masterpieces.
- Cool graphics and awesome animation that are really weird and wild.
- New sound effects that definitely go bump in the night!
- Where else can you prank a few of the horror genre’s most terrifying serial killers, monsters, and more?

TAG ALONG WITH TROLL FACE ONCE MORE

Troll Face Quest is one of the most popular, and addictive, tap game series of all time. Players get to team up with Troll Face while he plays clever tricks and pranks on everybody from the inhabitants of classic films to characters from the world of video games. He’s even staged practical jokes on several of the internet’s craziest viral memes. There really is no one that he won’t troll!

HORROR HAD IT COMING!

This time around, Troll Face is taking aim at a few of horror’s greatest hits. He may go on a chainsaw massacre while he saws his way through lots of pranks that are bloody hilarious in more ways than one! Troll Face is also bound to run into some even stranger things while he travels all across America and beyond to make sure that his tricks really get out. A trip to one of his favorite beaches might even lead to an encounter with the jaws of a great white shark! His latest adventure is sure to be packed with plenty of your favorite maniacs, killer birds, spooky puppets, pesky poltergeists, and lots more. Troll Face might even dig into some creepy pasta along the way!

But can you handle all of this shocking silliness and hair-raising hilarity? Find out while you discover what evil lurks in the heart of Troll Face Quest: Horror!

title: Garden Bubble Blaster - Critter Kingdom
description:
Explore magical worlds in our new bubble blaster game! Adventure through Critter Kingdom and meet lots of interesting characters as you complete over 75 relaxing bubble shooter levels. With more content added regularly, the bubble shooting mania never stops! 

The gameplay is simple – just point, shoot and blast 3 or more bubbles of the same color to wipe them off the board. Wipe enough bubbles off the board to win! But there’s more… Hidden around the worlds in Critter Kingdom are pieces of rare artwork and lost treasure. If you collect all the shards of an item, you can complete it and sell it for gold! 

While you’re shooting bubbles and collecting rare treasure, remember to rescue your pet from the evil witch and watch it grow as you progress through the game! It has special powers!

----------------------------------------------------------------------
GARDEN BUBBLE BLASTER – HIGHLIGHTS
----------------------------------------------------------------------
• Over 75 levels of bubble blaster fun!
• Rescue your pet and watch it grow as you play!
• Collect, craft & sell rare treasure
• Unlock and collect HD artwork hidden throughout Garden Kingdom
• Explore magical worlds & visit unique locations
• Receive coins and rewards every day just for playing
• Replay your favorite levels to earn extra bubble shooter coins
• Point, shoot and burst bubbles by matching 3 or more of the same color
• Empty the free coin globe every day for a huge reward!

 JOIN US ON A BUBBLE BLASTER ADVENTURE – DOWNLOAD TODAY!

title: Memory - Cognitive Skills Games
description:
Stimulate your memory and have fun with memory senior games. A complete collection of games that will help you develop your memory skills while having fun.
Within this app you will find different games to test your capacity of retention and memory in the short and long term.

Each game has different levels so you can practice gradually. In addition, you can see the score obtained in each level and visualize your progress. Ideal to stimulate the memory of older people.

TYPES OF GAMES

- Find card pairs
- Repeat sequences
- Avoid obstacles and trace the right path
- Remember figures and numbers
- Memorize patterns
- Associate objects
- Memorize elements of different images
- Distractive games to stimulate working memory

APP FEATURES

- Daily memory training
- Available in 5 languages
- Simple and intuitive interface
- Different levels for all ages
- Constant updates with new games

COGNITIVE STIMULATION

Senior memory games belongs to a collection of games designed to stimulate different cognitive areas in adults: Memory, Attention, Processing speed, Visuospatial Function and Coordination.

The design of these games has been carried out in collaboration with experts in neuroscience and psychiatry, with the aim of creating playful content and, in addition, serve as a complement to the treatments carried out in health centers.

ABOUT TELLMEWOW

Tellmewow is a mobile game development company specialized in easy adaptation and basic usability which makes our games ideal for the elderly or young people who simply want to play an occasional game without major complications.

If you have any suggestions for improvement or want to stay tuned about upcoming games, follow us on our social networks.

@tellmewow

title: Red Crimes: Hidden Murders
description:
A hidden object game, for crime scene investigation lovers everywhere!

Red Crimes: Hidden Murders - Corruption is ravaging the city of Rouxville. Crime has been left to run riot and your partner, Cadence "Red" Flanagan, is in deadly danger from a serial killer. Time is against you – download now and become world's greatest detective!

Investigate thrilling crime scenes, build the best crime scene investigation team and solve hundreds of cases. But, what will the next crime scene look like? Why are they doing this? Who are they and can you bring them to justice? All you know is your friend and colleague Red is in deadly danger.

Take control of Rouxville’s police department and build a team of dedicated csi professionals in this fascinating hidden object game, filled with real forensic scientist experiments. Red, the city’s top woman detective, will be at your side while you uncover the mystery of a never-ending series of brutal crimes. Analyse clues, build your criminal case, follow new leads and bring the villains to justice.

FEATURES
•	Investigate stunning 3D hidden object crime scenes and seek essential clues.
•	Examine clues and process blood, bullets, marks and other evidence found.
•	Perform realistic 3D autopsies to discover the cause of death.
•	Build and train the best team of police force professionals.
•	Manage and upgrade your police station to restore law and order in Rouxville.
•	Arrest the criminal minds and bring them to justice.

PLEASE NOTE - Red Crimes: Hidden Murders is free to play game, however some game items can also be purchased with real money. Acquiring in-app purchases is not required to complete your criminal case.

Download before it’s too late.

This investigation game is brought to you by Investigation Discovery, published by iEntertainment Network, and developed by Gamaga, the developers behind Banana Kong and Operate Now: Hospital.

ACTIVITIES
"Investigate" hundreds of crimes.
"Search" for hidden clues.
"Analyze" the victims body.
"Process" the clues found.
"Arrest" the criminal minds and solve the case.
"Lead" a team of CSI detectives.

title: Snood Original
description:
Snood is one of the most popular puzzle games of all time.
Snood is a fun puzzle game that tests your intellect rather than your reflexes.
The gameplay is identical to Snood you know from the 90's.

Your goal is to save all the trapped Snoods by launching other Snoods at them.
If you connect three or more identical Snoods, they will disappear.
If that leaves any Snoods not connected to the top of the playing field, they will fall to safety.
Don't take too long, though - every Snood you launch increases the danger level.

Snood is simple to learn but difficult to master and therefore great for ages 2 - 102!

Forget Life, Play SNOOD!

title: Meow Kitty Puzzle

meow kitty puzzle

Meow Kitty puzzle is a fun match-3 puzzle game. For all of you fans of online board games, get ready to fall in love with this popular cat game, available now for free on Android. Meow puzzle is awesome match 3 game. 1200+ levels for you..

The cats have wandered off and it's your job to bring them home again! Paw your way through hundreds of match-3 levels, restoring cat sanctuaries, and a storyline with dozens of unique cats!

You are in the wedding in the sea.
Find items, and solving the puzzles for escape from the room.

title: Hidden Object - Pixieland
description:
The Pixies are waiting to play with you in our new Hidden Object game! Search for hidden objects among the beautiful scenes. Are the Pixies more like elves or fairies? Find out for yourself in our newest fantasy-inspired game!

FREE PLAY MODE
Find hidden objects at your own pace. Find objects by their picture, shadow, word or random combination. Sit back, relax, and play casual rounds with no time pressure or – if you fancy a challenge – you can play the trickier timed modes. Can you find all the hidden objects before time runs out?

CAMPAIGN MODE
Try our Campaign mode for the ultimate hidden object adventure! Explore 200 stunning fantasy locations in Pixieland and complete hidden object puzzles with increasing difficulty. Hunt down objects in a variety of ways, play challenging timed levels, and enjoy fun bonus rounds, and play mini games!

ZOOM AND HINTS
Hidden objects can be hard to find when they are small or well hidden. That’s why we’ve made it possible to zoom and pan the HD images on each level. Stuck on a puzzle and can’t find the object? Hints are available when you need them! 

------------------------------------------------

No internet connection is required to play, so you can enjoy our fun hidden object game any place, any time!

EXPLORE PIXIELAND & EMBARK ON A HIDDEN OBJECT ADVENTURE TODAY!

title: Dug: Hero of Dig
description:
Dug: Hero of Dig is a classic arcade of mine game type.The objective of Dug: Hero of Dig is to eliminate underground-dwelling monsters, either by inflating them with an air pump until they explode or by dropping rocks on them. There are two kinds of enemies in the game: "Pookas" (a race of cute round red monsters, said to be modeled after tomatoes, that wear yellow goggles) and "Fygars" (a race of green dragons that can breathe fire when their wings flash).

The player's character is the eponymous Dug: Hero of Dig, dressed in white and blue and able to dig tunnels through dirt. Dig Dug will be killed if he is caught by either a Pooka or a Fygar, burned by a Fygar's fire, or crushed by a rock.

It takes four (three in some versions) 'pumps' with the player's action button to inflate a monster until it pops. A partially inflated monster will deflate and recover after a few seconds, but half-inflating is a useful way to stun an enemy for a few moments, especially to make sure it remains in the path of a falling rock. The player can also pass through the enemy while it is deflating. In some versions, deflating is slow enough that the player can execute rapid, partial inflate actions and pop a monster much more quickly than just holding the 'pump' button down.

The monsters move horizontally on the surface and both horizontally and vertically through the tunnels in the dirt. While in the tunnels they can also turn into ghostly eyes which slows their movement but gives them the added advantage of diagonal travel through the solid dirt and rock. The last remaining enemy in each round will attempt to escape to the surface and off the top left side of the screen.

More points will be awarded for exploding an enemy further down in the dirt (the levels are color-coded). Additionally, Fygars are worth double points if exploded horizontally, since they can only breathe fire horizontally in the direction they are facing. Extra points are also awarded for dropping rocks on enemies in order to eliminate them rather than inflating them. If one enemy is killed by the rock, it is worth 1000 points. The next two add 1500 points each, and any after that add 2000. The act of mining is itself worth points—giving 10 points for each block mined—so some players will do as much of it as possible when the threat from the remaining monsters is minimal.

After the player drops two rocks, a bonus item appears at the center of the screen, awarding points if the player can collect it before it disappears. These items consist of various fruits and vegetables, as well as the flagship from the Namco game Galaxian, and appear even if either of the dropped rocks fails to crush any enemies. In the original arcade version, the most points attainable from a single bonus item is 8000 from the pineapple, which appears in round 18 and every round thereafter.

If the player should drop a rock on a foe at the same time he pumps it to death, a glitch will occur whereupon all enemies will promptly disappear, but the game will not progress and the player will be free to dig through all dirt. Attaining the next level of play will then remain impossible, but the glitch can be resolved by forcing a rock to drop.

In the coin-operated version the game will end on round 256 (round 0), since the board is essentially an unplayable kill screen. When the round starts, a Pooka will be placed directly on top of where the player starts, and will kill  Dug instantly. There is no way to kill it, but the Atari version corrects this problem. No tunnels are drawn, save for the one that goes from the top-center to center. Strangely, a couple Pookas and Fygars also appear, but they don't have a tunnel to be placed in, so they are just overlaid onto the dirt. 

Let join and try pass over 250 map and levels of this maze game !

title: Smart Puzzles - the best collection of puzzles
description:
Smart Puzzles - a collection of puzzles in a cool design, a lot of games in one game. We put together different cool puzzle games in one game that takes up little space. 

Smart Puzzle game is suitable for those who like brain games, brain training or logic games. 

The main advantages of our game:

The game takes up little space
The game takes up little space and therefore even on weak devices it will be easy and comfortable to play.

 Is the game that worked without the Internet
Our game is easy and simple to play without an Internet connection. Play your favorite game without Internet. 

- Many games in one game
In our game a large number of the most popular puzzles was  collected. There are more than 5000 levels with different blocks, shapes, and forms. Our game belongs to the games that do not require a lot of memory. 

-	New game

 The game was made in 2018, so you will see a large number of interesting levels that you have not yet seen. New games, new challenges and many new levels, this is what is already in our game.


   -   Useful and brain-developing game
It is the best exercise for your brain to keep it in great shape. Our game uses brain training technology - go through simple but intricate levels, gradually increasing your IQ. The results of the measurement of your IQ will be displayed during the game.  

- A game for the whole family
The game is suitable for both adults and children. The game can be played by children from 3 years old, as we have divided all  the levels into 6 groups depending on their complexity. Therefore, our puzzle is for the whole family. Jigsaw puzzles for adults without the Internet. 


Collection of games "Smart puzzle" – these are the best and most exciting logic puzzles with minimalist graphics and beautiful design!

Our collection of games includes:

Block Puzzle

Move the blocks into special shapes. The shape for placing blocks can be either a simple rectangle or a square, or a more complex shape. 

Hex Puzzle

Blocks are assembled from hexagons (hexes), which also need to be moved to the form.

Pipe-plumber

It is a simple and addictive puzzle game. The idea  of the game is very simple - you need to lay the pipeline using the existing pipes on the playing field. 

Symmetry

It is an original and addictive puzzle game based on physical laws. You must help the figures achieve symmetry. Accordingly, this test is not only for your logic, but for the ability to judge by eye.

One line (1 line)
The game One line will require you to  do the strategic planning and logical thinking. On the playing field there are points that you have to connect with just one line.

Path
Go through your path using all the slots on the playing field. 

Puzzles with matches 

Puzzles with matches - in this classic game you have to solve puzzles with matches. Move, add or remove matches until you find a solution.

Crystals 
A classic block puzzle with a non-classical approach in which there are levels and very interesting tasks to train your brain. 


Download the free game “Smart puzzles” and pass interesting levels. Our game is fast to download and does not require a lot of memory.

title: Favo!
description:
Connect! Merge! and Collect the Elements!

Favo! is a new puzzle game which you won’t be able to put down!
The rules are quite simple and the game play is stress free!

[Goal of the Game]
Link the three elements (red, blue, and green) 
on the board to collect as many points as possible! 

When there is no more space left on the board, it’s game over.
In order to enjoy this game to the fullest and get a high score, 
mastering the correct technique and maintaining a balanced collection of elements is key.

[How to Play]
- Slide the element panels with your finger to move them.
- Tap the panels to arrange the order of the elements.

[Level Up]
When one of your collected element gauges is full, the element will level up!
You will get a Merge Panel of the same element as a bonus!

[Merge Panel]
Let's put a merge panel next to panels of the same color.
You can merge all connected panels at once!

[Combo]
When you match more than one color at once, you can get a bonus!
- 2 color match = double points!!
- 3 color match = quadruple points!!!!
