title: Crush Master
description:
Enjoy the sweetest puzzle game on the store. Join Crush Master and start crushing delicious combos! Make frosting matches, blast delicious candies, and make your day sweeter! Use your moves wisely and collect candies to advance. Earn awesome crashing boosts and power-ups that will help you crush treats and unlock cool combinations.

Match the delightful sweets and blast through the levels! 
Tons of exciting boosters and surprises await at this delicious match 3 puzzle. Play at your own pace and enjoy the sweetest candy game! Swap and smash candies, make rows of at least 3 frosting treats to remove them and clear the board. Collect matching candy to earn points and win awesome boosters that will help you get through levels.

Crush Master Game Fun Features:
* Play this candy game today and discover tons of exciting crashing levels filled with delicious pastries and surprises. 
* Match, explode, and crush at least 3 candies and cakes of the same color to pop the combination. 
* Addictive & free match 3 game.
* Awesome crushing boosts and fun candy challenges.
* Easy and fun match 3 game for the families and friends to enjoy.
* Beautiful graphics and effects.
* Explore enchanting candy worlds.
* Play online or offline-no internet and no wifi connection is required!


Put your matching skills to the test master the challenging candy game levels, collect candy pieces, and explore new crush game levels. Clear blasting levels to win boosters and surprises, improve your matching skills and enjoy the smooth and most addicting gameplay. 

Make special blasting combinations to create massive crunchy explosions:
- Match and crash 4 candies to get a striped candy of this color and create a line blast.
- Match and explode 5 sweets in an L or T form to get a bomb that will explode surrounding treats. 
- Match and smash 5 pastries in a row to get a rainbow blast. 
- Connect 2 special boosts to create even greater explosions!

Solve the brain teasers and win amazing blaster bonuses that will reward you with awesome cake power-ups that will help you beat all the challenges and win levels.

Play this cool blast game today - It’s a never-ending match 3 mania fun!

title: Toon Blast tips and reference
description:
Toon Blast 

. is a puzzle game based on the level at which you must achieve the goals of each level of progress
. Hit two or more cubes of the same color to blow them up and help achieve the targets
. Combines the number of cubes to create special powerful elements, such as rockets, bombs and mirror balls to remove obstacles and achieve level goal
. You can also combine these special items for larger groups and make your way to victory!
. You have a limited number of moves per level, so plan them accordingly


Toon Blast is the latest casual puzzle game from Peak Games. Kind of like the company’s earlier hit, Toy Blast, it’s all about matching up blocks in order to complete various objectives. It’s simple yet addictive stuff. If you’re just starting out, you might want some helpful advice on what to do.

That’s where Game Toon Blast Tips, Cheats and Strategies comes into play, offering up a bevy of useful tricks on how to succeed in this quirky world. 


"Attention"

This guide is not a game
The brand and pictures belong 
to their original owners and they are

Peak Games

Peak Games creates fun, social and engaging casual mobile games that are loved by millions of people all over the world.

title: Doctor Who Infinity
description:
Doctor Who Infinity is a new game platform for experiencing the Doctor's stories, with 6 adventures coming by the end of 2018. 

Unique puzzle game play changes from level to level with increasing complexity, where characters like the Doctor, Missy, Jo Grant appear on the board, as do opponents like Daleks, bombs, vehicles, and time vortexes. You have never played anything like this before. The game design is an innovation on the award-winning puzzle mechanic used in Doctor Who: Legacy with the mechanics tightly intertwined with story, immersing you in the story.

- FREE download of the game allows you to play the introductory arc of the first story as well as an introductory section of all stories released on the platform.

- This only in-app purchases found in this game are for the purchase of each story, nothing else.

- Each story features a different Doctor from a different era of the show, including both modern and classic Doctors, companions, monsters as well as entirely new characters to discover!

- Brought to life by Michelle Gomez, Ingrid Oliver, Katy Manning, Bella Ramsey, Celyn Jones, Steffan Rhodri, Nick Briggs and other incredible actors, as part of an amazing audio experience overseen by the award-winning audio director of Monument Valley, Stafford Bawler.

- Each story is written by a major Doctor Who author: George Mann, Gary Russell, Scott Handcock (launch stories) and Jac Rayner, Mike Collins in post launch stories coming soon.

- Comic book artists Mike Collins, David Roach, Neil Edwards, Dylan Teague, Kris Carter, John-Paul Bove, Emma Vieceli, Patrick Goddard bring these launch stories richly to life.

PLEASE NOTE that this game is aimed at the adult Doctor Who fan, comfortable with mature, dramatic themes.

Accolades / Reviews:

**Winner of UK Game of Show at Game Developer Conference 2018 from UKIE!**

Doctor Who Magazine says "These are the best Doctor Who stories ever told in a video game".

“The game was stimulating visually, audibly and mentally. I really enjoyed the story telling. It felt like the sort of thing one might see in the actual television program... It was a really unique puzzle experience that I've not seen utilised in other games.”
-The Gallifrey Times

“Overall, The Dalek Invasion of Time is a fantastic start to Doctor Who Infinity. ...While the gameplay is more refreshing than what we’ve seen in Doctor Who Legacy, it’s the story and the presentation that’s the main draw for this series.”
-Fansided

"On the board you’ll have to battle Dalek gems, protect character gems, deploy character gems, etc...It’s an interesting tactic in a gem game, and it’s, dare I say, revolutionary?"
- Geeks WorldWide

title: All Puzzle In One - 2018
description:
A collection of the best and most addictive logic puzzles, with minimalist graphics and unique level design!
The game contains the Connect, Tangram, Plumber, Blocks and other classic puzzle games, both easy and fun!
If you are a puzzle lover, you don't need to spend much time on searching new brain teasers any more. We will give you a All Puzzle In One - 2018 game experience from now on! 
- Water pipe:
Plumber is a route planning game by clicking to rotate the water hose assembly, in the hope that all the fittings will communicate to allow the water to flow out. Please note: different colors of pipe can not be crossed.
- Puzzle Game:
Blocks is a classic puzzle that you need to fill the entire board with different shapes of blocks. Just drag the right block, move it onto the board and match the right place. It's a perfect logic game for brain training.
- Connect : connect dots of the same color, find unique paths by not crossing each other
- Escaping:
You need to move boxes and let a red box escape along a way .
- Tangram: place the color blocks in the correct position
FEATURES:
- Tons of manually designed levels 
- Easy but Funny game play
- Minimalism graphics
- Playing the game with your FRIENDS
- No time limit
Enjoy the game with your friend & family with All Puzzle In One - 2018

title: Love Stars
description:
Love Stars is a brain training and challenging game!
At first time, it appears like an easy stars game to play!! but once you arrive to the third level you will certainly admit that's very difficult to master and needs a lot of reflexion and quickness at the same time! and this is where the real challenge is!

The Game Features:

√ FUN throughout the game! Guaranteed!
From a level to an other, you'll notice a kind of energy that submerges you! Your Adrenalin rose gradually!

√ Addictive, great pastime and helps beating boredom!
It's a mind trip for sure, but when you learn how it works, then it's one of those games you'll play while using the bathroom or at someone's house visiting that you really don't want to talk to! haha


√ Increases mental and reflexion skills!
After several times of playing, you will notice that your responsiveness and promptness have increased.

√ Challenge your friends and share the fun!
Stuck on a level? You can challenge your friends by sending a message with your score above and ask them to beat your score if they can!!

√ Compare your score with other players!
You can check your world position and check if you appear in the Top 100!

√ Free download! And doesn't require a registration!
No payment required. it's a free game to download and instal.


Have fun and challenge yourself! Be aware this is not an easy stars game to play!

Do not hesitate to leave your review Love Stars below!

title: Magic Triangle : Math puzzles for Genius
description:
■ Magic Triangle is suitable for you
- If you like brain teasers, math games, math puzzles, riddles, logical thinking, reasoning or puzzle games.
- If you want to improve your brain power, logical reasoning, and math skills, especially the mental math skills.
- If you want to play with friends or family.

■ Magic Triangle math games or math puzzles is a fun and unique brain teaser math puzzle game. It exercises your brain and improves the logical thinking. Kids and adults who love Maths will love this brain teaser puzzle called Magic Triangle.

Magic Triangle Math puzzles are very useful to spend your time and train your brain. Math puzzles always sharpen our mind and increase the brain power. You can see an improvement in your thinking by regularly practicing this math puzzles of Magic Triangle.

Math games always play an important role in our life as it increases the brain capacity. Daily practicing of math games surely results in a great brain power. And hence presenting you a math game Magic Triangle, that will surely blow your mind and keep you thinking.

Magic triangle puzzle game has been used to help improve kids with their brain functions in school and their pastime. Not only for kids, this puzzle can keep you mentally fit. It will improve your logic, reasoning and brain power and of course, math skills.

The game is designed to help people of all age levels improve their arithmetic abilities and mental math skills. Get ready to play the game and find out if you have a GENIUS brain or not!

Each of the brain teasers in this game is unique and pushes your creative thinking to the 
limit. If you can finish all levels of the game in minimum time, you will be pronounced a 
GENIUS!

■ How To Play
The rule is simple. You have to arrange the given numbers on the sides of a triangle with 
the same number of integers on each side, called the order of the triangle, so that the 
sum of integers on each side is a constant, the magic sum of the triangle.

This game is available in 
3 order triangle(3 numbers in each side of the triangle) and 
4 order triangle(4 numbers in each side of the triangle) puzzles.

In most of the levels, the magic sum that you have to do on all sides of the triangle has been already given to not make the game very harder. But on some levels, you have to find 
that magic sum also to challenge your brain.

You will try to complete a puzzle in minimum time to get more stars. You can use the hints when you find difficult to solve the puzzle. There are plenty of levels to boost your brain power. And many more would be added soon to keep you going.

■ Features
- Well-designed levels
- Best user experience
- Compare your scores with the rest of the world.
- Multi-Language

The game is available in multiple languages.
So, You can play and enjoy in your language.

■ Languages
English
Deutsche
Español
français
日本語
русский
中文(Simplified)
中文(Traditional)

■ Contact
For any query or suggestions, feel free to write us at bhargavthanki77@gmail.com
Have fun!

Math games always play an important role in our life as it increases the brain capacity. Daily practicing of math games surely results in a great brain power. And hence presenting you a math game Magic Triangle, that will surely blow your mind and keep you thinking.

Magic triangle puzzle game has been used to help improve kids with their brain functions in school and their pastime. Not only for kids, this puzzle can keep you mentally fit. It will improve your logic, reasoning and brain power and of course, math skills.

The game is designed to help people of all age levels improve their arithmetic abilities and mental math skills. Get ready to play the game and find out if you have a GENIUS brain or not!

Each of the brain teasers in this game is unique and pushes your creative thinking to the
limit. If you can finish all levels of the game in minimum time, you will be pronounced a
GENIUS!

■ How To Play
The rule is simple. You have to arrange the given numbers on the sides of a triangle with
the same number of integers on each side, called the order of the triangle, so that the
sum of integers on each side is a constant, the magic sum of the triangle.

This game is available in
3 order triangle(3 numbers in each side of the triangle) and
4 order triangle(4 numbers in each side of the triangle) puzzles.

In most of the levels, the magic sum that you have to do on all sides of the triangle has been already given to not make the game very harder. But on some levels, you have to find
that magic sum also to challenge your brain.

You will try to complete a puzzle in minimum time to get more stars. You can use the hints when you find difficult to solve the puzzle. There are plenty of levels to boost your brain power. And many more would be added soon to keep you going.

■ Features
- Well-designed levels
- Best user experience
- Compare your scores with the rest of the world.
- Multi-Language

The game is available in multiple languages.
So, You can play and enjoy in your language.

title: Kakuro Game - Cross Sums
description:
Also known as Cross Sums, Kakuro is a mix between a crossword and sudoku puzzle. Unlike a crossword puzzle where the clue is a word or phrase, a Kakuro clue is a number that the corresponding answer cells must add up to. That’s where the sudoku part comes in. Each clue has at least 2 and no more than 9 answer cells. Each answer cell must be a single digit (1-9). Duplicate digits are not allowed within a clue (4 = 1+3, 4 ≠ 2+2).

Each puzzle has a unique solution that can be solved without guesswork.

Features:
- clean, minimalistic design
- simple, intuitive controls take the hassle out of solving Kakuro puzzles electronically
- thousands of puzzles (all free)
- puzzle progress is auto-saved
- multiple sizes (3x3, 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7, 8x8, 9x9, 9x11)
- multiple layouts for each size
- multiple difficulties
- multiple control types
- stats include your ranking vs others who have completed the same puzzle
- drag to select/deselect multiple digits at once
- sync data (stats and in-progress puzzles) between devices with a free KakuroGame.com account
- works offline
- works in both portrait and landscape orientation
- phone and tablet support

title: Pastry Pop Blast - Bubble Shooter
description:
Pastry Pop is a fun and free bubble popping match-3 game filled with the most amazing desserts you’ve ever seen! Think fast and make quick decisions to connect, shoot, and burst every bubble on the screen!

Chef Kate makes some of the most delicious cakes and desserts in the world, while her friend Lenny delivers them to customers. Chef Vincent hates that everyone loves Kate’s desserts more than his own, so he hatches a cunning plan. Whenever Lenny takes a dessert out for delivery, Vincent traps it in a magic bubble! Kate and her friends have to work fast to make sure those desserts are delivered on time, and they need your help to do it!

Pastry Pop transports to you a magic world of bubble connecting, popping, and colorful puzzle solving. Bright and colorful graphics will bring a smile to your face, while the fun foods and challenging levels will keep you bursting bubbles all day long!

Features:
- Shoot and pop magical bubbles to free the desserts!
- Line up moves to make huge matching combos.
- Tons of levels to puzzle through.
- Amazing power-ups.
- Crazy characters to meet.
- Fun, exciting, and FREE to download! 

Blast your way to bubble popping success in this wild match-3 puzzle game!

title: Halloween Magic - Witch Puzzle
description:
Play now the best new match 3 game you will ever see: Halloween Magic - Witch Puzzle!
Match 3 or more magic items to solve puzzles and enjoy hours of fun in this highly addictive match 3 puzzle game played by millions of adults, girls and boys! Download for free and challenge your brain!

Match 3 games have never been so fun! Help the cute little Witch in this new puzzle game by solving puzzles presented by the powerful Wizard! Get ready and join the adventure in this brand new match 3 puzzle game! 

HOW TO PLAY Halloween Magic - Witch Puzzle - MATCH 3 GAMES
- Swap and match 3 or more magic items
- Collect free prizes everyday
- Beat challenging enemies by matching items next to them
- Create powerful combos by matching more than 3 items 
- Train your brain with more than 600 fun puzzle levels and counting

JOIN THIS PUZZLE ADVENTURE
- Match your way through the magic world of Halloween Magic - Witch Puzzle
- Match enchanted items from Halloween such as skulls, pumpkins and poisoned apples to clear the board
- Connect to Facebook to save your progress, check your rank in the leaderboard and ask lives for your friends
- Special Levels: super hard puzzles, great for brain training
- Completely FREE to play
- Looking for games you can play offline? No wifi needed to play Halloween Magic - Witch Puzzle

MATCH FASTER WITH POWER-UPS
- Magic Book: Match 5 items to create it. Combine it with an item to destroy all matching items 
- Magic Combo: Match Magic Fire and Crystal Ball to create a combo
- Wizard Spell: Clear all the items of the game
- Free Move: Move an item freely, even without a match 
- Magic Broom: Sweep an item from the game
- Magic Wand: Select 8 connecting items to destroy them, even without a match 

Start your adventure with this witch themed match 3 puzzle game to unleash the power of pure magic right away! Play Halloween Magic - Witch Puzzle for never-ending fun!

ABOUT UPBEAT GAMES
Our mission is to create the best, cool, fun and engaging games to be played for free anywhere on mobile devices. We want to make boys, girls and adults happy with our Upbeat Games!

title: Elementix
description:
Touch the stars, everything is possible in the puzzle game Elementix! 
Travel through the underwater world with its bright fish, playful jellyfish, fast seahorses and giant whales. Walk across the colorful meadows of the green world or enjoy the fantastic scenery of the purple world. Admire the incredible sunsets and dawns in the red world or discover something new among the vastness of space. 
The logical game Elementix presents 200 exciting levels with incredible adventures and unexpected meetings.
Only upward to new discoveries is the main motto of Elementix! Travel upward on the game map and discover new locations with the passage of each new level. 
You need to move the game chips to their bases making as less steps as possible to pass the level. You can move chips only vertically or horizontally, but not diagonally. Several game chips can be placed in one row and if one of them moves then the entire row moves.

Features:

1) 200 fascinating levels in five amazing worlds. And this is only the beginning!
2) No to time limits! Play at your own pace, think about every step and enjoy the colorful design!
3) Travel through the colorful landscapes of the game map from the most remote sea depths to the boundless vastness of space. And find out what's next?
4) At each level, unexpected meetings with different Elementix dwellers that will interfere you in the tasks are waiting for you. Wolves, raccoons, foxes, bats, spiders and even mushrooms. All kinds of obstacles in here!
5) To pass each level you are given a certain number of steps. The less moves is spent, the more points you get. Also, the carrots are given for the successful walkthrough of the level. 
6) The Bomb and Undo boosters will help you to pass the level. Use them in the most desperate situations!
7) Nothing to do with the natural disasters. A volcanic eruption, a falling meteorite or a piece of ice block the walkthrough of the level. Be careful!
8) In the warehouse, you can exchange carrots for boosters. Besides, carrots can be bought for real money.

title: QUANTIFIERS! - A Mathematical Logic Game
description:
Inspired by the Not Not game and a first year calculus course (MAT137) at the University of Toronto, Quantifiers was developed by undergraduate students to ease the math learning curve, yet basic arithmetic is all you need! (You don't even need to know times tables!)

Quantifiers challenges the user to answer mathematical logic riddles by answering with the interval of numbers that satisfy the question. This game introduces users to foundation logic using mathematical notation which is essential in proof writing. 

-offers two fast-paced game modes (classic & craaazy!)
-easy-to-learn tutorial, no experience required!
-personal high score tracking

title: One Line - 1 Stroke Drawing Puzzle
description:
One Line is a simple yet challenging puzzle game, with one and only rule. Connect the dots along with all the lines to complete the puzzle using 1 stroke only. 

More than 140 puzzles included, from easy to complex levels. More puzzles will be added in the future. 

You can start from any of the dots, then connect along the lines. You have to connect dots using all the lines available. Some lines are one way only, for some you have to go twice. If you get stuck, hints are available. Hints are limited, so use them wisely. You can get hints by viewing ads. 

The game is supported by ads. You can remove ads completely by purchasing, though you have to get hints by viewing ads. Your feedbacks are greatly appreciated.

description:
SRCH! and find hidden objects coloring game is fun for all ages! Best of two worlds: find the animal, object, doodles and complete the puzzle from a coloring book to see it in all its glorious, vibrant colors!

SRCH! Coloring book is a hidden objects game with a twist - unlike other coloring games SRCH! combines best of both worlds - find hidden objects to color art objects and immerse yourself into coloring therapy.

SRCH! Is the kind of search and find game that is fun for all ages - to find an item is equally rewarding for kids and adults alike. Hidden objects for kids are fun, but find items in pictures is equally fun, yet suitable for adults as well.

Improve your concentration, practice your detective skills, find objects and solve puzzles!

Feel like an artist and browse your hidden objects works!

Tips. No hidden object is unfairly hidden - tips will help you find items no matter the difficulty of the puzzle.

Various puzzle difficulty - have find items in pictures should be fun and rewarding for beginners and masters alike!

SRCH! Is a color app that opens world of coloring for adults and for kids alike. Pick a puzzle, find items and make them come alive in vibrant, vivid colors! Finish a puzzle from a coloring book and proudly add it to your works list.

SRCH! - color game for all ages! Various difficulty levels and themes will suit all ages and tastes! Animal color art, flowers, fruits, vegetables, musical notes, stars and starships - all here to help you relax and create pieces of art.

Like coloring games? You’ll LOVE SRCH! Unwind after a long day at work, coloring therapy is there for you! Color art pieces of various themes, constant updates will keep you busy, don’t worry, color your life happy!
descriptionHTML:
SRCH! and find hidden objects coloring game is fun for all ages! Best of two worlds: find the animal, object, doodles and complete the puzzle from a coloring book to see it in all its glorious, vibrant colors!

SRCH! Coloring book is a hidden objects game with a twist - unlike other coloring games SRCH! combines best of both worlds - find hidden objects to color art objects and immerse yourself into coloring therapy.

SRCH! Is the kind of search and find game that is fun for all ages - to find an item is equally rewarding for kids and adults alike. Hidden objects for kids are fun, but find items in pictures is equally fun, yet suitable for adults as well.

Improve your concentration, practice your detective skills, find objects and solve puzzles!

Feel like an artist and browse your hidden objects works!

Tips. No hidden object is unfairly hidden - tips will help you find items no matter the difficulty of the puzzle.

Various puzzle difficulty - have find items in pictures should be fun and rewarding for beginners and masters alike!

SRCH! Is a color app that opens world of coloring for adults and for kids alike. Pick a puzzle, find items and make them come alive in vibrant, vivid colors! Finish a puzzle from a coloring book and proudly add it to your works list.

SRCH! - color game for all ages! Various difficulty levels and themes will suit all ages and tastes! Animal color art, flowers, fruits, vegetables, musical notes, stars and starships - all here to help you relax and create pieces of art.

Like coloring games? You’ll LOVE SRCH! Unwind after a long day at work, coloring therapy is there for you! Color art pieces of various themes, constant updates will keep you busy, don’t worry, color your life happy!
summary: Find hidden objects with SRCH! Lots of puzzles to solve, coloring games to play!
recentChanges: Bug fixes and minor improvements.

title: Jigsaw Puzzle – Jesus Jigsaw Christian Games
description:
What's the best way to build your logical skills...playing Jigsaw Puzzles. 
We all know that God is among all of us! Praise the Lord anytime and anywhere by playing this puzzle game-‘ Jesus Jigsaw Christian Games’. 

There is no better way to know about the life of Lord Jesus than by playing this jigsaw.
Relax and enjoy amazing puzzle designs with beautiful pictures of Lord Jesus and share his teachings with your near and dear ones.

Jesus Jigsaw Puzzle is a new and innovative way of learning about Lord Jesus life by placing the pictures of God in correct order.

You can also share images of Lord Jesus along with beautiful quotes and teachings of Lord Jesus.

Jesus Jigsaw Puzzle is not your ordinary puzzle game - it's much, much more!
It helps you along the path of self-learning with the help of framed puzzles, which will help you to learn where pieces fit together. Helps you to apply your mind and skill. This puzzle game ranges from simple puzzles to complex puzzles, providing fun for all ages. It develops memory, problem solving skills and logical skills as well as entertains us. It’s a great game for all. This game teaches us about Christianity, Holy Bible, life of Lord Jesus and above all the importance of God in our lives.

How to play:
Touch and drag to align the jigsaw piece to the right place. Rearrange all the pieces to complete the entire image. Use peek button to preview the original image. The more you play, the harder the puzzle gets! 
You can select difficulty level by choosing tiles from 4 to 49 pieces.
Features: - 
* Family friendly puzzle game.
* Puzzle with HD wallpapers of Jesus and Bible stories and Christianity.
* 3 different game modes:
    -classic
    -slide
    -swap
* Every puzzle is unique.
* Simple and easy to play.
* Amazing graphics and relaxing soundtrack.
* Simple interface.
* Allows you to share images of Lord Jesus with quotes.
* Easy movement of pieces across the screen.
* Suitable for all ages.
* Perfect brain exercise.
* Play whenever and wherever you want to play.
* Develops ability to focus and increase concentration.
* A perfect choice for all puzzle lovers.
This jigsaw puzzle game has everything you need to train your brain and logical skills.

title: Line Puzzle Monster
description:
Move the blocks of the same color, arranging them larger or equal to 5 blocks, to have other colored blocks..

Collect fun monsters, sell them to collect lots of coins

 If you think it sounds simple then think again! There are many challenges created by evil monsters, bombs, and skulls

This game is line puzzle monster. You can spend your time game and take the highest score. You can beat more competitor in line puzzle monster and become the champion of this game.

HOW TO PLAY
• Arrange the same color blocks, forming horizontal, vertical and diagonal rows. Note they must be greater than or equal to 5 colored blocks!

• Try to collect funny monsters, when you reach the limit, you can sell them and get coins,

• Set multiple blocks to kill the evil monsters

• Don't worry! No time limits!

FEATURES
• Simple rules and Easy control 
• Various Blocks and colorful graphic
• Smooth and delicate animation
• Funny sound effects
• Hours of fun, exciting play
• Support leaderboard

title: Mahjong Game : Classic Solitaire
description:
Mahjong solitaire Game can be played solo .In this case the aim is to accumulate the most pairs and to score the most points. Points are gained for each pair removed, with bonus points for removing matched pairs in sequence or removing pairs in sequence that are parts of sets. Using traditional mahjong tiles, the sets include the dragons, the flowers, the seasons, and the winds.

This game has a timer running. There is also hints and/or undo options which provides the ability to have a match found for the player or to backtrack and undo already made moves. Additionally, most implementations of the game arrange the tiles in such a way that the game is solvable in at least one way.

Mahjong solitaire games options:

     1.Shuffling the tiles.

     2.Changing the tile set and patterns from the traditional tiles to flowers, jewels or 
         other items that may be easier to match up at a glance.

      3.Playing a series of different layouts with varying levels of difficulty. 

      4.You can also share you scores with your friends on Social Apps (whats app , 
          telegram,etc) and challenge them to beat your score.

      5. More than 50+ levels.

Enjoy the Game. If you like the game do Rate it and spread the word .Thank You. 


By installing this app you agree to the following privacy policies:
'http://www.appsgeyser.com/privacy/app/'

title: 🎮Differences of clash royale🎮
description:
Surely you know clash royale 🎮, created by the clash of clans🕹️ developers, and if you're one of their fans you can not miss this app of differences of your favorite clash royale🕹️ characters.
 
Find 🔎 the differences between the pekka and the montapuercos, between the nocturnal witch and the ice magician, between the magical archer and the giant goblin and between all the letters of clash royale.

Between your decks 🃏 of clash royale you will have a card that is your favorite, today you can play differently, analyzing the scenes 🖼️ of your favorite characters and finding the differences.

It does not matter if you are in the Montepuerco arena or in the electric valley, or if you still do not have a good war mallet, the important thing is to find the differences and move on to the next level.

Are you ready to enter the clash royale dispute war? But be careful, time flies away and you need to find the differences quickly. Your favorite characters will help you, like the sparks, the electric magician, and even the giant.

Have you seen the sinister eyes of the pekka? look at them well, because they hide a surprise. You should be careful even in the smallest details, although they say it is difficult to find the real ghost of clash royale 😂.

All your favorite characters in a single application, but all hide sublime differences, which will be very fun to search and find. Play in the arenas of clash royale and try to reach the end of the game.

Collect the clues and use them when you can no longer find the differences.🎮 Win one track per completed level 🎮.
We know that this game is difficult and that it will put your nerves on edge, but no battle royale has been easy, that's why they are strategy games and you'll have to be quick to find the differences.

Do not be afraid of the golem, or the night witch, let alone the dark prince! They believe that you do not know their secret, what they hide, but if you know it and you will reveal it! No war mallet can escape from finding your differences!

Application features:
✔️Ambedded in the world of clash royale.
✔️Decenas of levels.
✔️ Free tracks with each level unlocked.
✔️ Common, special, epic and legendary cards play to the differences.
✔️ Soon the new cards and the best decks for clash royale.
✔️Without gems or gold, just your observation to find the differences.

We hope that you play the game as much as we enjoy creating it.
This application is not official Supercell and Supercell is not responsible for it or is related to clash royale. This application complies with the Supercell fan content policy, for more information, see the Supercell Fan Content Policy: www.supercell.com/fan-content-policy.

title: Lost Island Match 3
description:
Lets play the best sparkling match 3 blocks blasting game! 

Click on any 3 or more adjacent block of the same color to discover the secret of lost island. 


How to play
1.	Move and Match 3 or more jewels of the same color to earn points.
2.	Obtain MAGIC ancient pendant by matching 5 jewels. Use powerful MAGIC ancient pendant to gain an edge!
3.	Clear your missions within a given number of moves, beware some with time limit!
4.	Easy and fun to play and yet challenging match 3 to fully master. 

Lost Island Match 3 Features
- 370 brand new levels which are full of exciting jewels and blast and more levels coming soon!
- Adventurous treasure hunt in the jungles, under the sea and beaches. 
- Popular and classic  match 3 puzzle gameplay
- Colorful and delicate sparkling jewels.
- Build up your treasure cave by collecting more jewels
- Playing addictive game for FREE. In app purchases available. 

To all island treasure lovers! Collect as many gold jewels & historical artifacts in the island.

title: Spot The Differences
description:
Find the differences between two similar images, meanwhile you can enjoy the amazing and beautiful images. Improve your observation skills and train your brain, try and spot the differences between the two similar images. You can relax and spend a interesting and meaningful leisure time with the wonderful game.

Spot The Differences sometimes called “Find The Differences”or”Find Differences”, a classic puzzle game, maybe you played the classic game when you are a child, now the game is in your phone with more wonderful and beautiful images, more challenging levels.

The images will bring you the feeling of beauty, the games will bring you a interesting challenge, Are you ready for the challenge?

How to play: 
Just find the differences between the two similar images, tap the differences on the image

Features:
● Free to everyone
● Easy to use
● Suitable for anyone, adults and children
● Beautiful images
● Smooth interface

Find the differences in the diverse, interesting and colorful world 
Now the search is a pleasure!

title: Bunny Blast Puzzle
description:
Tap to make powerful combos, destroy colorful obstacles, and enjoy the rich bunny-tastic world of fun, Bunny Blast features many hop-tastic game missions and styles that anyone can enjoy and learn quickly! 

==> HOW TO PLAY<==
- Tap more than 2 of the same fruits to blast them!
- Tap more than 7 of the same fruits to generate special fruits: rocket, bomb or rainbow!

==> GAME FEATURES <==
- Perfect gaming experience.
- Easy and completely free game.
- Very friendly to ladies.

title: Autumn Photo Puzzles
description:
Photo Puzzles are tile puzzles similar to a jigsaw puzzle but with square pieces. A picture is broken into squares that are then jumbled. Select two squares to switch their positions. Continue until the puzzle is solved.

Points are scored for the number of pieces moved to their correct position. Puzzles with more pieces are easier but you cannot score as many points.

Scoring:
No pieces in correct location: -1 points
One piece in correct location: 2 points
Two pieces in correct location: 8 points
Choose the number of pieces for easy to difficult game.

Includes photos of Halloween, harvest, and Fall.

title: Hexa Puzzle - Number Sorting Brain Game
description:
The idea of Hexa Puzzle Sorting Game is based on classic fifteen puzzle but in hexagon shape. 

On the start a number of hexagon tiles are created and shuffled randomly, player rearrange all tiles and proceed to next level. The game uses the idea of basic number sorting game but in shape of hexagons. Hexa Puzzle level's become very challenging due to shape of tiles and obstacles. 

Some levels seems easy but they are very tricky to complete.

How to Play:
- On start of game all the tiles are shuffled
- Tap on the tile besides empty area to shift the tile to empty area.
- Empty area shows number of tile to be placed on it.
- Tile on correct position will turn green.
- Move all the tiles on correct positions to proceed to next level.

title: Puzzle Brick Classic
description:
Puzzle Brick Classic is a classic and fun block game. This Puzzle Brick Classic has new time rush mode.

Puzzle Brick Classic Game is the classical and legendary game. I'm sure with you that you had played at least one time when you were child.

With Classic Mode & Time Rush Mode on Puzzle Brick Classic game
The different of Puzzle Brick Classic:
I-blocks are useful for competing four lines at once.
O-blocks for filling large gaps.
L-blocks for filling medium-sized holes.
J-blocks face the opposite direction as L-blocks.
S-blocks for filling small holes.

HOW TO PLAY BRICK CLASSIC GAME ? 
• Place the blocks pieces into board. Once you fill in a horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces and level up
• Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.
• Blocks can be rotated.

FEATURES
• Simple rules and Easy control 
• Various Blocks and colorful graphic
• Funny sound effects
• No time limits.

Please Enjoy Our Puzzle Brick Classic Game. Try it and you will love this block brick puzzle game!

title: Maze Cube - Free Labyrinth / Maze Game
description:
Maze Cube accelerates the development of mind faster in kid's colorful world.
It's a fun maze game for your kids and you. 
The labyrinth game will be painted with various colors to make your memory grow and develop. 
Maze/Labyrinth games prevent memory traps in adults and children.
The Maze Cube energy system helps you speed up your journey to find your way through the maze.
When playing with your friends, use the timer to find out who will complete the labyrinth in less time.
The star system shows how successful you are at each level.
Maze Cube can easily be downloaded and played with a size of under 30 MB. 
With 12 episodes you will be able to challenge your limits and play the game of intelligence.
To play the next episodes, you must finish 12 episodes and wait.

If you want to download the maze game, you can press the download button above.
Do not forget to include your comments and suggestions in the comments section.

Have a Gooooood Time!!! :)

How does the star system work?
> When you finish each labyrinth you will get 1 star.
> You get the 2nd star in every maze when you get the star in certain places.
> For each maze you will get the 3rd star in case you finish the section with a period below the ideal time.

How does the level system work?
> Level 1, 2, 3 => Beginner Level Labyrinths 1,2,3
> Level 4, 5, 6 => Intermediate Level Labyrinths 1,2,3
> Level 7, 8, 9 => Expert Level Labyrinths 1,2,3
> Level 10, 11, 12 => Legendary Level Labyrinths 1,2,3

title: Happy Glass - Happy Cup
description:
The glass is sad because it's empty. Your job is to draw a line to make the glass filled up with liquid and smile again! Happy Glass 2 - Happy Cup is kind of puzzle game, it demands brainstorm to find solution.

Try to find the best way to complete each level. You can come up with your own solution so be creative and don't be affraid to think out of the box!
Some levels might look easy but let's see if you can actually get the 3 stars.

Happy Glass - Happy Cup Features
* Dynamic mechanism. Draw lines & use brain freely to complete levels!
* The only thing you need to do is to “fill glass”
* Will you be able to clear these simple-looking but actually difficult stages?
* Easy to play and play it anywhere even without internet!

The rules are simple!
Let's bump the two balls

All you need to do to clear a stage is to “fill glass with ice cubes to make glass happy”.
Draw lines and shapes freely to move and roll the ice cubes.
Flexible thinking is going to become the key to victory.

When you hit the target with a ball, the target knocks down or explodes.
Achieve the stage score to clear then challenge the next level.
In this game you have to break piano glass tiles as fast as you can.You don't have enough time to think just tap tap on glass tiles and progress as much as can in happy glass tiles.

I hope you enjoy Happy Glass - Happy Cup!

title: Flip The Coin
description:
Play the world`s most challenging coin toss puzzle game. Try to find the best way to complete each level. You can come up with your own solution so be creative and don't be afraid to think out of the box! Dozens of brain busting physics puzzles, with more being added all the time.

Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution? All the levels can be unlocked for free by earning stars in previous rounds. It is the ultimate coin flipping game & an excellent game for training and development of your brain skills. Wanna flip a coin for a hard decision? This game will let you select your favorite coins to aim on targeted glass. Spinning coin animation, sound, text, vibration, shake-to-flip and coin type are coming soon. You'll get the similar experience of flipping a coin when you're using your hands to pull up in the same way you push the coin. This game has real physics involved in it which may give you tough competition. Many more interesting levels are under construction coming soon.

If you like this flip the coin game, please rate it and leave a comment, your support is greatly appreciated.

Challenging game play
Physics based puzzle game.
 Lots of levels with more coming soon!

Non stop fun with amazing flip coin game

title: Pets Halloween Match 3
description:
Hurrah! Hurrah! Welcome into "Pets Halloween Match 3"!

In this game six super cute animals will spend the exciting festival with you! Wow~ Hurry to pick the one you love and set out on the marvelous Halloween trip.

Trust us, the fantastic costumes here will turn your pet into a much-anticipated star. And the various mini games will impress you with their fun and uniqueness, such as making jack-o-lantern, blowing the scary balloons, enjoying spooky cakes, taking photo stickers, doodling and so on. If you are keen on adventure, then the Haunted House is created for you!

Hey, life's no fun without a good scare, let's get addicted to "Pets Halloween Match 3"!

Pets Halloween Match 3 features:

+ This is a completely free game, even the props is completely free!
+ More than 550 level kinds of delicious sweet fruit sugar.
+ Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!
+ Different areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, an old mansion, and much more
+ NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Games you can play offline. It's so amazing fruit game

HOW TO PLAY: Pets Halloween Match 3

• Swipe to match 3 or more cartoon Halloween.
• Collect the Pets, and complete the levels in saga land!
• With the colorful and powerful boosters, it is easier to try a level!
• Enjoy other various missions!
• Achieve 3 stars to get more coins!

Pets Halloween Match 3 is suitable for all countries and all language.

Amazing Pets Halloween Match 3 is one of the best matching and puzzle game!

or try your hand at the new Color Mode!

title: Happy Glass - An Excellent Stress Buster
description:
Are you looking for brain games? We all have heard negative things about games. Some people believe games will make our children more violent and less social. This is a misconception; playing games can help you reduce depression and stress. This is why playing games make you feel better. So, by adding a game to your routine you can improve mental health.
There are plenty of games available on different platforms. One of the latest and enthralling games you can get is Happy Glass. This is an amazing game that will help you stimulate good mood.
Happy Glass is one of the best Physics games that will help your children enhance their cognitive abilities. The game is extremely simple and easy to play. It will not only help reduce stress but will improve creativity. 
In this post, we have highlighted the reasons why Happy Glass is perfect for removing stress. Have a look!
Easy To Play
One of the reasons to play this game is that it is easy. All you have to do is make the glass happy by filling it with the liquid. You can do it by drawing a line. Once the required level of liquid is filled in the glass, it will become happy. That is all, you just have to use your creativity to find new ways to fill up the glass. 
Improves Creativity
Another reason for playing this game is that it will help in giving your creativity skills a boost. The mechanism of the game is dynamic. You can draw lines anywhere and of any type; there is no restriction. You can use your imagination to complete the level with 3 stars. 
Helps Relax
This game has a relaxing theme and soothing music. It will help you decrease stress and forget the troubles of your life for some time. 
Stimulate Cognitive Function
Brain games like Happy Glass are an amazing and fun way to improve your mental health. This game will help you enhance brain power and maintain capacity for memory. This will help increase the mental sharpness. 
Furthermore, the game has different levels. The difficulty of the levels increases, this makes it more challenging to complete the level. However, it is still easy to complete the levels. 
Perfect For All
Happy Glass is an interesting and fun game for adults and 3+ children. The game will help in relaxing and reduce stress. This will make them feel happy and good about themselves. It is useful for children as it promotes mental health. It will help them understand the concepts of physics. Additionally, it enhances problem-solving skills and makes them more competitive. This is because they will not rest until they have completed a difficult level. 
Therefore, not all the games are bad for children. Happy Glass is a wonderful and fascinating game that will help eradicate stress from your life. This game is available for download on both Apple Store and Google Play Store. Hence, get this game and remove stress and depression from your life.
descriptionHTML:
Are you looking for brain games? We all have heard negative things about games. Some people believe games will make our children more violent and less social. This is a misconception; playing games can help you reduce depression and stress. This is why playing games make you feel better. So, by adding a game to your routine you can improve mental health.
There are plenty of games available on different platforms. One of the latest and enthralling games you can get is Happy Glass. This is an amazing game that will help you stimulate good mood.
Happy Glass is one of the best Physics games that will help your children enhance their cognitive abilities. The game is extremely simple and easy to play. It will not only help reduce stress but will improve creativity.
In this post, we have highlighted the reasons why Happy Glass is perfect for removing stress. Have a look!
Easy To Play
One of the reasons to play this game is that it is easy. All you have to do is make the glass happy by filling it with the liquid. You can do it by drawing a line. Once the required level of liquid is filled in the glass, it will become happy. That is all, you just have to use your creativity to find new ways to fill up the glass.
Improves Creativity
Another reason for playing this game is that it will help in giving your creativity skills a boost. The mechanism of the game is dynamic. You can draw lines anywhere and of any type; there is no restriction. You can use your imagination to complete the level with 3 stars.
Helps Relax
This game has a relaxing theme and soothing music. It will help you decrease stress and forget the troubles of your life for some time.
Stimulate Cognitive Function
Brain games like Happy Glass are an amazing and fun way to improve your mental health. This game will help you enhance brain power and maintain capacity for memory. This will help increase the mental sharpness.
Furthermore, the game has different levels. The difficulty of the levels increases, this makes it more challenging to complete the level. However, it is still easy to complete the levels.
Perfect For All
Happy Glass is an interesting and fun game for adults and 3+ children. The game will help in relaxing and reduce stress. This will make them feel happy and good about themselves. It is useful for children as it promotes mental health. It will help them understand the concepts of physics. Additionally, it enhances problem-solving skills and makes them more competitive. This is because they will not rest until they have completed a difficult level.
Therefore, not all the games are bad for children. Happy Glass is a wonderful and fascinating game that will help eradicate stress from your life. This game is available for download on both Apple Store and Google Play Store. Hence, get this game and remove stress and depression from your life.

title: Jigsaw Puzzles - Christmas Puzzle Games 2018
description:
What's the best way to build your logical skills...playing Jigsaw Puzzles. 
Christmas season is just around the corner and we all are getting ready for it!
Here's an insanely addictive and entertaining Christmas puzzle game, featuring a fresh look and lots of all-new puzzles.

Relax and enjoy amazing puzzle designs and share beautiful images of Christmas festival along with quotes with your loved ones. You can easily send Christmas greetings through this puzzle game.

Jigsaw Puzzles - Christmas Puzzle game is a new and innovative way of learning about Christmas festival and Santa Claus by placing the pictures in correct order.
Jigsaw Puzzles – Christmas Puzzle isn't your ordinary puzzle game - it's much, much more!

It helps you along the path of self-learning with the help of framed puzzles, which will help you to learn where things fit together. Helps you to apply your mind and skill. This puzzle game ranges from simple puzzles to complex puzzles, providing fun for all ages.
Kids as well as adults will love solving this jigsaw puzzle game

How to play:
Touch and drag to align the jigsaw piece to the right place. Rearrange all the pieces to complete the entire image. Use peek button to preview the original image. The more you play, the harder the puzzle gets! 
You can select difficulty level by selecting tiles from 4 to 49 pieces.

Features: - 
* Family friendly puzzle game.
* Puzzle with HD Christmas wallpapers.
*Game has lots of Christmas related photos like Santa, Christmas trees, snowman and many more
* 3 different game mode:
    -classic
    -slide
    -swap
* Every puzzle is unique.
* Simple and easy to play.
* Allows you to share beautiful images with quotes.
* Amazing graphics and relaxing soundtrack.
* Simple interface.
* Suitable for all ages.
* Perfect brain exercise.
* Play whenever and wherever you want to play.
* Develops ability to focus and increase concentration.
* A perfect choice for all puzzle lovers.
This realistic jigsaw puzzle game has everything you need to train your brain and logical skills.

description:

- more than 100 free levels - from simple to complicated
- completely suitable for everyone - puzzles for adults, puzzles for children
- there are no time limits for you, but you are provided with a limited number of moves in -
each round, this will give you an opportunity to reveal all your skills and start up the brain 
game without the Internet - play wherever and whenever you want
- task solving - is useful and always exciting 

The main aim of the game is to plumb the pipeline. You just turn different pipes and plumb the pipeline. At first glance everything is very simply and easily, but a right decision may appear not so simple among the entanglements of various pipes, branchings, taps and pressure sensors.

The genre of the plumber game can be qualified as the best puzzle games for the brain, but at the same time, this is a puzzle adventure, a puzzle for adults and a family puzzle. Join millions of players in ROBOTEX : CHALLENGE THE TRANSFORMERS! play with the Autobuts or Decepticons and see the full picture of the transformers.

Join Optimus Prime, Bumblebee, Waspinator, Rhinox, Grimlock, Soundwave and many more of your favorite bots in the challenge for complete the full pictue and upgrade to next level of the game.

To assemble the transformer, it is necessary to move all the items from the right side to the left side of the screen.

Moving parts used with the mouvement of the fingers on the screen.

To open the levels of "Bonus" and "Frize" it is necessary to go through all 20 levels of the game.

title: Sudoku

Sudoku is a math game, just like a puzzle, where you will have to break your head to try to solve it.

Sudoku is a Free number game challenge, a fun game for lovers of deduction and logic . 

INSTANT FUN 
No registration, no internet required, no complicated rules. Start playing, and have fun! 

SIMPLE AND HIGHLY ADDICTIVE GAME 
In the cells of sudoku... What number will you put? Look at the sudoku with all your genius in order to solve the puzzle 

You can play sudoku offline at any time. No Internet required!

TRAIN YOUR MIND 
Playing Sudoku is one of the best hobbies. Enjoy learning day by day with the best sudoku for android!

title: Color Grade
description: Color Grade is a game for short play sessions like waiting for a bus to arrive or a movie to start. Color Grade includes six practically infinite level packs full of eye-catching color gradients that are appropriate for all ages. Players place tiles into the puzzle area to complete the image and move onto the next level.

title: Fill The Glass : Make It Smile
description:
Fill The Glass is an entertaining puzzle game that challenges players to fill a glass and make it smile and happy again by solving drawing puzzles.Though at first sight it may not seem a complicated task,Draw Lines To make water into the in Glass, you should know that the difficulty of the puzzles increases as you go up the different stages. 

If you don’t manage to get the three stars when completing a level, replay it.This will help you improve your Draw Lines skills, which will be helpful in the long run and Happy Water. If you decide to go for the easy option for know how to fill the glass, you can always achieve that much desired third star by watching an ad.Up to a certain extent, it may feel like cheating. But Be happy it’s still a valid option.

There are no useless elements in Fill The Glass, If you really need some help in Water Game, take advantage of the hints.
Fill The Glass hints are rather expensive. So make sure to use them only when it’s absolutely necessary.
Though these hints show you exactly how to break through the level, it is true that some levels do seem impossible to solve.

In Fill The Glass, you will earn more stars depending on how much of the pen tool you use.The amount of ink you have left is indicated by the bar at the top of the screen, use this bar to avoid completing levels with two or fewer stars. So, 
when you are in a level that requires a lot of drawing and Physics Games, you should take your time and draw it slowly and make it happy . If you touch any object in the scene, the pen tool will freeze,so be careful and avoid touching the edges.

features :

- nice smart and fun puzzles but can be challenging too
- Fun and amazing theme

Essentially there are a million ways to use the pencil,and normally the simplest way is the most effective like Brain Games. 
So take your time, don’t get frustrated and utilize those around you. You’d be surprised how a fresh pair of eyes can have a unique approach to a level that you’ve been stuck on for ages.

Fill The Glass is available to download and play for free on Android devices from the Google Play Store.

title: Cookie Cake Match 3
description:
cookie cake match 3

Collect yummy cookies to marth through this amazingly sweet story!  sweep match 3 or more cookies to solve compelling 

levels in this puzzle adventure! 

features:
** over 1000 levels, more levels than any other Match-3 game!
** sweet and delicious UI & cool animation effects.
** easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master
** gather powerful boosters and power-ups to beat the toughest stages.
** play and enjoy thousands of colorful puzzle levels in this fun addicting game.

How to play:
** move and match 3 or more cookies of the same type to burst and win points.
** collect prizes and make special cookie combinations to create a cookie crush!
** eliminate the more cookies line quickly can get extra scores.
** boost your experience with awesome power-ups.
** reach high scores and try to get 3 stars on every level.

title: Ten ten Puzzle - 10x10
description:
Ten ten Puzzle - 10x10 is a wildly addicting brain teaser, it's a simple puzzle game that will challenge you, while also training your brain. 
The concept is simple, on a 10X10 board, combine puzzle blocks and clear the board by placing them strategically to create lines. 
Play alongside your friends, and enjoy the free puzzle game!

FEATURES:
- Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age
- Classic Block and colorful graphic
- Smooth and delicate animation
- Funny sound effects
- Play game without internet and no time limit
- Play free game anytime and anywhere

HOW TO PLAY
- Your mission is to hit the highest score you can by matching shapes of brick blocks and clear lines both vertically and horizontally.
- Just drag and drop the given blocks into the 100! board and starts the journey of mastering your brain. Don’t let the blocks fill the grid board.
- Try to fit them all in the row or column. Then the block will be clear and you get the point.
- This puzzle game ends when you have no more space for a given block to put in the board.
- Blocks can't be rotated.
Let download block legend puzzle game immediately. Introduce the wood block classic puzzle game with friends to play together.

title: God's Orbits - Gravity Puzzles
description:
God has been making planets and stars orbit around each other for billions of years. But as any normal person, He now needs a break. So, as God takes a week’s vacation and goes to Cancún, you need to replace Him and do His job.

The game is a gravity simulation based on Newton’s law of universal gravity where you control the speed and direction of a single planet. You’ll need to find the precise trajectory of this planet to make it orbit around another celestial body.

A lot of features are offered to diversify the different challenges at hand.

Features:
•	Every planet in our solar system
•	Suns
•	Antimatter stars
•	Neutron stars
•	Wormholes
•	Time bending black holes

The game contains a total of 60 levels where the first 7 are free and the other 53 can be unlocked with one single purchase.

title: Supernatural Quiz
description:
If you are a fan of the TV series "Supernatural", then this game is for you.

In the game "Supernatural Quiz" you need to open a photo of the hero, and then guess "who is this" and write the correct answer. The fewer openings are made, the greater the reward.

The game features characters of all the characters of all thirteen seasons.

In the meantime, the fourteenth season of this series is coming out and this is another reason to download this game, because it will help remember all previous seasons.

The game has 40 levels. New levels will be added every Sunday.

If the level has turned out to be difficult for you, this is not a problem. The game has tweaks that will help you to go even the hardest level.
You have hints as credit to get clues even answer the question.
Every you pass the level, you will get more coins.
Fortunately, if you lack of coins, you can get another by sharing on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or VK.

Thank you for downloading and hope this game will bring you a lot of fun.

Developer: Zhekun Inc.

title: Trap for Monsters - Search and Find Objects Game
description:
Follower of the secret order! Embark on a unique investigation in the world of ancient monsters and search for clues in their habitats! The newest search and find objects game! The werewolf and the ghost, the mummy and the forest spirit are just the first in the line of suspects. Figuring out the clues in a mysterious castle, an enchanted forest or a witch's lair will be a great challenge! Try the newest of search and find games .

    Colorful 360 degree scenery, animation, and 3D visual effects will make your search and find objects adventure vivid and fun. Those with a competitive streak can collect bonuses for speed and repeat the quest with new puzzles. 

    Hidden Objects Game features:
- Look for hidden items in 360-degree panoramic scenes
- Look behind objects! Your clues may be hidden there. 
- Build your collection. Go through scenes again to try new quests and get new rewards!
- Fascinating settings reflecting the nature and habits of monsters, unexpected discoveries and hidden clues are awaiting you!

...For centuries, our order has been guarding the frontier between the realms of good and evil. A special amulet held all our power and wisdom, but in the full of the moon it was stolen. You must recover the amulet.

   This new search and find objects game (HOPA) is TRULY FREE: you can download the full version for free and unlock every scene with no in-game purchases. 

   Good luck in your journey!
   If you are looking for high-quality really free search and find objects games , then “ Trap for Monsters . HOPA “ is exactly what you need!

We'll be happy to stay in touch with you at www.facebook.com/CrispApp - make comments, ask questions, get news about coming hidden items games! Look for more new search and find objects games from our studio!

title: Wood Block Puzzle
description:
Wood block puzzle is a wooden style block puzzle game. You can play this wood block puzzle to train your brain.
The block puzzle is very fun for all ages and skill levels. More wood blocks, more score. Try it and you will love wooden block game.

Wood Block Puzzle is not only a classic puzzle block game,but a challenging puzzle game.
Play this wood style block game to relax and train your brain.
Simple, fun and pleasurable for all adults and children. It has all feature of great puzzle block game.
Play wooden style block game, you will love this wood block puzzle game.

How to play wood block puzzle:
-> Drag the wood block to move them.
-> Try to fit them all in the row or column. Then the wood blocks will be clear and you get points. Game will be over if there are no room for any the shapes below the grid.
-> Wooden block can't be rotated.

Features of the wood block puzzle :
-> Beautiful wood blocks.
-> Sweet sounds.
-> No time limits.
-> With Beginner's guide, easy to learn.
-> Totally free.
-> Support leaderboards.

From now on, let's enjoy a simple and addictive wood block puzzle game! Once you start, you'll be hooked!
You can play wood block puzzle anytime and anywhere! 
We really hope you enjoy playing wood block puzzle!

title: Cookie Crush
description:
the best match three game ever!
Cookie Crush is a super addictive match 3 match game and captivating splash puzzle. This match 3 game is completely free for match three game lovers to make cookie blasts and unlock more levels in this brain challenging game.
This matching three puzzle offers tons of missions. Each level has different missions to complete and the difficulty will increase at each level. Starts out simple, but things will get more and more complicated and challenging. Match three Cookies to crush and clear the board!
Bring this No.1 Match 3 game to your Android smartphone or tablet now because it is full of fun and you will love it!

Why will you have to download and install Cookie Crush on your android smartphone or tablet instead of other match three games?
★ Fantastic wonderland, hundreds of well-designed free levels! We will update and add more free levels and game modes very soon!
★ 100% Free! No need to spend much money to enjoy the best puzzle game ever!
★ Want to play our game anywhere? It's possible because we support the offline mode and you can enjoy playing even if you don't have a 3G, 4G or Wi-fi internet connection.   
★ Want to play our game anytime? It's possible because our game is responsive and compatible with all android devices, so you can enjoy playing on your android smartphone or tablet.    

---------HOW TO PLAY--------------
★ Swap and match cookies in a group of three or more. Think twice before every move because you will have a very limited number of moves to clear each board.
★ Beat tough hundreds of levels!
★ Fun and easy game to learn, but a rewarding challenge to master! Everyone can start playing because it is very easy to play.

What are you waiting for? Download Cookie Crush and enjoy the most addictive match three game ever!

title: Dotcraft.
description:
Dotcraft. is a minimal color-based combination puzzle game. To solve the puzzles, move the dots by sliding your finger in different directions to line up with the matching slots. Create hand-crafted shapes in each level. Those who can't find the right path to match the dots with the correct slots, please enjoy the Swap Option! You can easily change the place of two dots.

There are 2 different boards to play:

Linear: Move the dots by sliding horizontally or vertically to line up with the matching holes.

Diagonal: Place the dots by sliding along vertically or diagonally to line up with the same color-coded slots.

Features:
Free to Play!
No ads option
Mind-bending difficulty and colorful design
2 Different fun and challenging boards - Linear & Diagonal
Play through 600 beautifully designed brain-twisting levels
Peaceful and relaxing music and sound fx

One Touch Gameplay
Touch and slide your finger along the given directions.

Visual Developments
If you want to see your Dotcraft. different than others check our themes page, there are 7 unique and stylized themes.

Playmodes
Play on Soft Mode to create shapes without having to worry about time or move limits-No Stress..

If you want to test your brain, try Challenge Mode to see your time and move counts by creating shapes and improve your strategy!

You can also connect via Facebook or Google+ to see your and your friend's score on leaderboard in every level!

Follow us on:
https://facebook.com/rootcraftgames
https://instagram.com/rootcraftgames

Enjoy!

title: Balloon Pop Splasher
description:
Relax your mind by playing this simple yet enjoyable balloon popping game. Popping sound is soothing, and plan your move strategically to splash as more as possible as once to get the highest score and challenge with your friends.

Balloon pop splasher comes with different modes and settings where you can choose your own preferences of gameplay. Each mode of settings has its own highest score recorded. Splash all the balloons to break your high score from time to time!

Game Features:
* Relaxing balloon splashing sound effects
* Attractive and various gameplay background of choice
* Different balloon gravity settings
* Balloon moving and scoring animation
* Cute and addictive gameplay environment

Download balloon pop splasher and introduce it to your friends! Don't forget to leave a comment / review to help improve the game.

title: pop.in: it's game night!
description:
Welcome to Game Night. Join one of our events, and you might be invited up on stage to play a  multiplayer party game against our host and other players in front of a live audience! This isn’t another live trivia app. 

Don't want to get on stage? Stay in the Audience, take in the action, and learn how to play.   

Our first game is Liar's Dice - a dice game of bluffing, wit and deduction. (There are many variants of this game, like Dudo, Cachito, Perudo or Dadinho, and some of you might call it "pirate's dice," "deception dice" and "diception") 

Think YOU have what it takes? Every member of the Audience has a chance to get invited on Stage to compete for prizes. 

Want to learn more about Liar's Dice? Come to an event! 

We'd love your feedback as we work on any fixes, adjustments to the game, and add features to make this the best Game Night EVER! Just tap on the pop.in logo inside our app, or email us at support@pop.in

title: PHONEy Words
description:
Do you realize we dial numbers on our phone everyday and yet we rarely use the letters?
Now we can use them and have FUN with the phone !
Put those letters next to the numbers and play
                            PHONEy Words
                             7 8 2 2 3 7 7   !
                        What does that spell?
                             S U C C E S S  !
That’s right.Take numbers from your phones dialpad and have your friends try to translate or guess those numbers into words.
Play vs. others until they figure out the word or they have to HANG UP and wait for the next challenge.
You can play against the system against the clock.
Solve the words,earn points and advance to the next level.
                             4 6 6 3    5 8 2 5
                            G O O D    L U C K

title: Number Search Puzzle
description:
Welcome to the Number Search Puzzle, it's  type of hidden numbers games. To win in this game you must find the hidden numbers that are on the board and are indicated in the lower area of the screen.

*** Features***

    -  Numbers game for kids
    -  Train your brain finding hidden numbers.
    -  Simple and intuitive user interface.
    -  Local High Scores.
    -  Ads are only displayed when the game is over.
    -  Does not use intrusive permissions.

** Difficulty levels **

    -  Easy: For new players or kids.
    -  Normal: For players looking for a challenge.
    -  Hard: Only for experienced players.

** Type of boards **

    -  Decimal: It's the classic board.
    -  Hexadecimal: Numbers from 0 to 9 and the letters from A to F
    -  Binary: Only 0 and 1.

¡¡ I hope the Number Search Puzzle becomes your favorite numbers game!!

Your comments are very important, any suggestion or bug report is welcome. Please, before writing a negative comment, contact by email or Twitter:

urcigames@gmail.com
 https://twitter.com/urcigames

title: Hexia: Hexagon Block Puzzle
description:
Hexia is a fun and exciting classic hexagon block match puzzle game. Its gameplay is simple - on a hexagon board, drop hexa blocks of different shapes in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. Clear multiple lines at a time to get diamonds. Combine, connect and destroy puzzle block shapes! 

You can challenge yourself by competing with your friends, getting high score and sharing it with the world. Combine, connect and match blocks in this addicting challenge that will put your logic skills to the test. This KING of BRAIN TEASERS will train your brain, help you develop logic and mental capacity. Don't let the shapes fill the hexagon grid!

Check out special themes to make your game experience endlessly exciting! A great casual puzzle game that you can not stop playing once you started the game. Enjoy this free block puzzle with no time limits. 

▶ IEC Game:
- Email: iecgame.ca@gmail.com

title: Plumber Game: Plumber Pipe Connect
description:
Welcome to our amazing game plumber!

Let’s present your skill and intelligence to connect pipes and make a complete water path.

Game of plumber is wonderful to increase your brain power! Although the rules of the plumber games are very simple: touch the pipe to fix pipes, make a complete water path, the water pipe game requires players to have tactics to overcome many challenges in the pipeline games.

If you have difficulty in playing the water pipe line connecting games, watch our intuitive game guide or use helpful hints to play the pipe repair game easier. Thanks to the gorgeous HD graphics and super-realistic sound effect, the plumber puzzle games is attractive to you.

What are you waiting for?! Let's explore our addictive pipe logic game before play!

☸There are 2 modes in this plumber connect pipes game:
- Play: This mode consists of 35 levels with increasing difficulty level
- Daily challenge: complete all 8 levels and get 100 coins

☸ How to play pipe connecting game
- Touch the pipes to turn them
- Make a water path from valve to container
- Open the valve

☸ 2 hints to play pipe logic puzzles game easier
- Hint to remove all pipe sections which are not parts of water path
- Hint to show you some parts of water path

 Why you should play our plumber pipe game 
- Interesting and tactically challenging pipe connect game 
- Support helpful hints to help players easily overcome challenges
- Intuitive game guide, easy to understand
- Nice HD graphics, realistic sound effects
- Suit for all age
- Plumber games free

With this pipe connection game, players can both entertain and increase your brain power when you connect dots pipe lines. The plumber repair game is very suitable for those who want to be smarter! Are you ready? Quickly download water pipe connect game and enjoy great time!

Share your favorite game with friends and family to experience our exciting plumber pipe connect game together.

Do not forget to rate 5* to support the developers of the master plumber game.

title: Color by Number - Low Poly ArtBook
description:
Color by Number - Low Poly Art Book is popular among kids and adult! It is the latest color by number app with beautiful low polygon artworks. Color by Number - Poly Art book provides jigsaw and coloring puzzles of various styles, which could be 3D effect, traditional painting, isometric illustration, pop, cartoon, pet etc.

Color by Number - Low Poly Art Book is based on a very new and unique idea of bringing art and puzzles together just like heart and mind coming together. With this No. color game you can enjoy latest and majestic artworks with unique color by number pattern. You have to put colors into the images while solving the jigsaw puzzles. It’ll bring you the satisfaction of solving a puzzle and filling color at the same time and gives you a pleasure of making your own master piece artwork. So, what are you waiting for download Color By Number Low Poly Art No. Color and let the fun begin.

How to play Color by Number - Low Poly Art Book:
- Drag polygon pieces and place them in the correct area.
- Identify the target area either by number, color or shape.
- Play like a jigsaw puzzle.
Color by Number - Low Poly Art Book are a great way to teach your kids or students basic number recognition, how to use a legend, and it will give them the opportunity to develop sense of beauty and sense of art.
This is a great activity to practice your drawing skills. It’s also fun for any age to try to finish the drawing by completing the pieces of artworks.

Features:
- Very unique concept and design.
- Large number of different poly images.
- Fun of jigsaw puzzle and coloring in the artbook at the same time.
- Very easy and relaxing gameplay.
- Amazing HD colors and Graphics.
- Beautiful and majestic images to color.

title: Triangle Candy - Block Puzzle
description:
Triangle Candy - BLOCK PUZZLE game
Triangle Candy is a very fun and exciting classic block match puzzle game.
Triangle Candy - Block Puzzle game is simple - on a hexagon board, drop triangle blocks of different shapes in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. Clear multiple lines at a time to get diamonds. Combine, connect and destroy puzzle block shapes! 

HOW TO PLAY
1. Simply drag the given blocks and put them into the hexagon board
2. Remove the blocks by making full any lines!
3. You can rotate the blocks by finding CANDY and fill up candy hexagon.
4. Try to remove multiple lines at a time to get higher score :D

Triangle Candy - Block Puzzle game is magically with colorful, Make color, make block puzzle, make life.
Check out special themes to make your game experience endlessly exciting! A great casual puzzle game that you can not stop playing once you started the game. Enjoy this free block puzzle mania with no time limits. 

FEATURES
- BLOCK MATCH PUZZLE
- Easy to play, kill your time.
- Offline game: no WIFI, no problem
- Instant save data: play save, play everywhere
- STUNNING GRAPHICS: fun sounds and gorgeous visual effects
- ENERGY SAVING: play without wasting energy
- MANY THEMES: Snow, Night forest, Autumn, Galaxy, Freeze, Park, Las Vegas, Cat, Chinese, Mid-Autumn.
