title: Halloween Witch 2018
description:
Match 3 or more magic items to solve puzzles and enjoy hours of fun in this highly addictive match 3 puzzle game played by millions of adults, girls and boys! Download for free and challenge your brain!

Match 3 games have never been so fun! Help the cute little Witch in this new puzzle game by solving puzzles presented by the powerful Wizard! Get ready and join the adventure in this brand new match 3 puzzle game! 

HOW TO PLAY Halloween Witch 2018 - MATCH 3 GAMES
- Swap and match 3 or more magic items
- Collect free prizes everyday
- Beat challenging enemies by matching items next to them
- Create powerful combos by matching more than 3 items 
- Train your brain with more than 600 fun puzzle levels and counting

JOIN THIS PUZZLE ADVENTURE
- Match your way through the magic world of Witch Puzzle
- Match enchanted items from Halloween such as skulls, pumpkins and poisoned apples to clear the board
- Special Levels: super hard puzzles, great for brain training
- Completely FREE to play
- Looking for games you can play offline? No wifi needed to play Halloween Witch 2018 

MATCH FASTER WITH POWER-UPS
- Magic Book: Match 5 items to create it. Combine it with an item to destroy all matching items 
- Magic Combo: Match Magic Fire and Crystal Ball to create a combo
- Wizard Spell: Clear all the items of the game
- Free Move: Move an item freely, even without a match 
- Magic Broom: Sweep an item from the game
- Magic Wand: Select 8 connecting items to destroy them, even without a match 

Start your adventure with this witch themed match 3 puzzle game to unleash the power of pure magic right away! Play Halloween Witch 2018 for never-ending fun!

ABOUT UPBEAT GAMES
Our mission is to create the best, cool, fun and engaging games to be played for free anywhere on mobile devices. We want to make boys, girls and adults happy with our Upbeat Games!

title: Puzzle Dom Puzzle Game Collection
description:
Puzzle Dom Puzzle Game Collection

"Puzzle Dom Puzzle Game Collection" merged best puzzles like Connect, Tangram, Plumber, Blocks, Rolling Ball, One Stroke, Box, Rope, Lazors and Escape which are easy to learn and fun to master into ONE game collection.
As a puzzle lover, you don't need spending much time on searching new brain teasers any more. We will give you a ONE-STOP game experience from now on! 

Fond of classic puzzles but tired of so many separate single puzzle games? Puzzle Box is a mystery box. Puzzledom is a collection of addictive logic puzzles, including Flow, Tangram, Escape, One Stroke, Blocks, Plumber, Fill, Rolling Ball, Sudoku, Weave a Line,Huedoku and Number Link.More free games are on their way to your puzzle kingdom!
If you are a fan of classic logic puzzles, Puzzle Box will be the best one stroke. Come and challenge the puzzle flow free, gain the jigsaw pieces and build your kingdom.

Features:

★ free puzzle games flow is a classic free Japanese game also known as Number Link or Arukone. You have to connect the pair of dots of the same color so the lines do not cross or overlap. The entire board must be filled fun puzzle games. 
★ Brain puzzles Pipes, also known as Plumber, is a rotation puzzle where you have to connect all the pipes to let the water flow through the pipeline. Tap the pipes to rotate them and connect the pipes of the same color.
★ Block Puzzle is a simple yet extremely addicting puzzle game about blocks. Similar to Color Fill, the goal is to complete the entire board by dragging the block pieces. A hexa mode will be added in the future fun puzzle games.
★ fun puzzle games Shikaku, also known as rectangles, is another classic Japanese game from the same inventor of Sudoku. Shikaku is played on a square or rectangular grid with some numbered cells. The objective is to divide the grid into different areas, each of them containing 1 numbered cell and the exact number of squares indicated in that numbered cell.
★ puzzle cube unroll is a unique thought-provoking brain teaser inspired by slide puzzles. Move the tiles to form a path that connects the green and red tiles and watch the ball roll. Unroll features 250 levels in 5 difficulties or packs. Unlock the fun now! 
★ Unblock is a deceivingly simple yet challenging sliding block puzzle game. The objective is to move the blue block to the exit, by sliding the horizontal blocks side to side or the vertical blocks up and down. Wooden pieces, cars or even a mouse:Unblock has come in different variations but none of them equals Puzzlerama´s.Don´t worry if all the pieces seems interlocked, just move them out of the way!
★ Bridges, also known as Hashi, consists of a series of islands that need to be connected following a couple of simple rules. You can only connect two horizontally or vertically adjacent islands, you can connect a pair of islands with only 1 or 2 bridges and each island should be connected the indicated number of times fun puzzle games.
★ puzzle dom classic puzzle all in one find a way to connect all the dots in a single line. Start connecting two dots and you will get addicted immediately to this brain stimulating puzzle game. 
★ puzzle collection lasers is a puzzle about moving blocks to reflect the laser beams and hit the targets. Sometimes you can make infinity loops.
★ brain puzzles has over 8000 free levels inside and more funny levels are under development mystery box.
★ We only put best puzzles inside which will make you can not stop once start playing puzzledom puzzle game.
★ We will support online rank list soon all in one puzzle! You can challenge your friends by achievement and leader board.


As you play and enjoy Puzzlerama free puzzle games, new games, modes and features will be included! Please don´t hesitate to send us an email with any suggestions or comments. 

puzzle dom classic puzzle games all in one brain puzzles also free puzzle games mystery box,puzzle cube,fun puzzle games,puzzle collection

title: Word Brain Baldy
description:
Word Brain baldi Basic Education & Learning in School
Are you a word search expert?
Do you enjoy the excitement of classic word games?
Word Brain baldi Basic Education & Learning in School
Word Brain is an word play app designed to train your brain and learn new words, all while having a great time.

This wordbrain baldi game is a true brain quest, to train your brain.
This is a word puzzle game - words connect for true word geniuses!

It starts out very easy but gets challenging quickly. The increasing level of difficulty, with themes ranging from Food to Space, will challenge even the toughest Brainiacs out there. The smartest word game enthusiasts will have a real challenge to complete this game.

Features of word brain - free puzzle word game:
- Free to play.
- Over 2000 brain twisting word puzzles
- Split into 37 unique Themes
- Multiple challenging levels with increasing difficulties.
- Intelligent Hint system to find words, help you pass the level.
- Daily Puzzle to help you gaining more hints!
- No time limits! Be puzzling relaxed.
- Share this wordbrain with your friends to earn helps.
- Expand your vocabulary: progress and increase your brain size
- Word Brain baldi Basic Education & Learning in School
How to Play this vocabulary games:
- Connect the letters to create words by simply swipe the letter blocks (swipe words) and build the words to find the word (word hunt), and see the puzzle collapse.
- Find all the words to complete the levels
- Exercise for the your brain, finish word puzzles in a level, become a vocabulary master! (word's master)

Complete the levels with themed puzzles and advance from being a simple Word Newbie to a Super Word Mastermind!

Share the fun with your family & friends and enjoy Word Brain Themes Ruzzle free.

Please put your reviews and suggestions to help us improving this mind game app!
Have fun!

title: Happy Milkshake Glass
description:
With Happy  Milkshake Glass (a cup game), you have to draw lines to guide water from its starting point to fill the glass (a cup) placed on each level. The concept seems simple — and things start out super easy — but as you continue to play, it becomes trickier to get the water into the glass, forcing you to be more clever.

Happy  Milkshake Glass (a cup game) is the ultimate physics-based drawing puzzle game developed by Bigapp.Inc. The aim of the game is to fill the empty cups of each level with free touchscreen drawings. The reward system in Happy  Milkshake Glass (a cup game) depends on how much of the pen tool you’ll use. The total amount of ink left is displayed at the bar on top of the screen. A maximum of three stars means that you used just the right amount of ink and succeeded in filling the glass in that particular level. If you are in a level that demands a lot of drawing it’s better to make the drawing slowly and more carefully. Substantially there are hundred of ways to use the pencil and make a particular drawing but the simplest way would also be the most effective one according to this game. 
    Happy  Milkshake Glass (a cup game) features smart and funny puzzles that also can become very challenging. Some levels might look easy but getting the maximum of 3 stars may often seem almost impossible. Happy  Milkshake Glass (a cup game) will make you solve a level in one way and then require a totally different approach for the next one. The game will always try to keep you challenged while searching for the most appropriate solution. Just because one technique has worked on a few previous levels, doesn’t mean it will work every single time. Also whatever you draw will have some serious weight to it, not just in terms of impacting the flow of water, but also the physical weight of what you draw. Try always to find the best way to complete each level. You can come up with your own solution so be creative and by no means don’t be afraid to think out of the box, it’s a game that will encourage you to try it all. If you get stuck in the game by any chance, check out the video walkthrough all the so far levels of the game with a three-star assurance:
fill the pot
hapy catch
playing hopy
waterglass
copos
einem
game happy
gua
full of stars
happi
aline
g fuel
fill-up
Happy  Milkshake Glass (a cup game) is a charming puzzle game available on iOS, challenging you to fill a glass by solving drawing puzzles that become more and more difficult as you go up the stages. And we’re here to help you complete the game by sharing our Happy  Milkshake Glass (a cup game)with you!
I know that a Happy  Milkshake Glass (a cup game) would be a bit more welcome in this case and we’ve got you covered with that as well. But in case you want to still do it yourself without always be told exactly what to do, our tips and tricks will come in handy and they’ll give you a bit more satisfaction than a walkthrough for all levels would.
With these in mind, let’s check out some Happy  Milkshake Glass (a cup game) Cheats and tips below to complete this wonderful game!

Use the elements given in each level
There will never be elements in a level that you shouldn’t use. There’s no decor in Happy  Milkshake Glass (a cup game) and whenever you have a circle, a platform or something there in the level – you will have to somehow use it to complete the level.

Get the free prize whenever possible
Watching an ad after each level doesn’t seem that fun, but it won’t only support the game’s developers and encourage them to create more smart games like Happy  Milkshake Glass (a cup game), but it will also give you some amazing rewards.

Happy  Milkshake Glass (a cup game)
Now if everything else fails, you can always check out a walkthrough for the game to get you through the stages. But only do it if you really can’t beat a particular stage in the game – and make sure you only do so for the level you can’t complete. Otherwise, all the fun is gone.

description:
Swipe with your fingers, collect matching all the stars of the same color. Pair all stars, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle in Color Meet. Easy to control and smooth to play! Exercise your logics and brainpower. Enjoy the magic star maze.

HOW TO PLAY
★Pair up all the same stars in the square with single continuous lines
★Lines can’t cross over each other
★Star is the end of each line
★All the block in the square must be filled

FEATURES: 
✔ FREE to play all the game modes
✔ Lots of exciting and awesome levels
✔ Swipe to link colorful stars, easy to play
✔ Fantastic HD colorful graphics!
✔ Nice, clean graphics and smooth game play
✔ Board size: 5x5, 6x6, 8x8, 9x9, 10x10
✔ 5 kinds of difficulty for you to exercise
✔ Suitable for both adults and kids!
✔ No time limit, you can play at any time
✔ Compatible with most of smartphones
✔ See more feature by installing it

Game mode: 
Easy mode: 5x5 square suits for beginner. Easy to play, easy to complete.
Normal mode: 6x6 square color link game. Standard difficulty is suit for each person. 
Hard mode: 8x8 square. You need to connect 7 pairs of stars. This mode is harder than earlier and more exciting!
Extreme mode: 9x9 complex square. Difficulty upgrade, you need to link 9 pairs of stars to complete the level. 
Hell mode: 10x10 square. Challenge your extremity and brainpower. Draw different lines and Link all the dots. Have fun and enjoy!

Play hundreds of levels with more hardness as you play more levels. There is 5 modes with 5 x 5 levels and ending with 10 x 10 for smartphones. Each levels enjoy different difficulties. title: Magic Square Ultimate
description:
A magic square is a grid containing the numbers, where each row, column and diagonal add up to the same number which is called magic number.


In this game player is provided with two number grids.
One in the upper side is puzzle grid and lower side contains numbers to solve the puzzle.
Player needs to fill the puzzle grid such that it forms a magic square.
The magic number is given at the top.

Player needs logical thinking as well as should know arithmetic addition subtraction to solve the puzzle.


Presently puzzle grids of three sizes are available - 3X3, 4X4 and 5X5.

This game application generates large number of puzzles, moreover puzzles would not repeat even if the player resets the game and starts again.

title: Cube Legend Crush
description:
cube legend crush

Join us on a adventure in the brand new cube legend crush! Tap 2 or more bricks and complete the challenges of each level.

Enjoy hours of fun, and tap the bricks in order to blast them away and complete the missions. The more cubes you pop at 

one move, the better the chance you’ll unlock a cool booster that will help you defeat the obstacles.

Use the cool power ups and boosts at the right time to clear the board and win awesome prizes! Enjoy a smooth addictive 

gameplay, beautiful designs and fun logic puzzles. Test your color matching skills in this awesome puzzle game, master the 

challenges and complete levels.

- click on any 2 adjacent bricks of the same color to blast.
- play through hundreds of fun levels.
- overcome obstacles and achieve high scores.
- clear the challenging levels and advance along the map.
- complete the mission each new level presents.
- plan your moves and clear the board!
- match 5 or 6 cubes to get a rocket.
- match 7 or 8 cubes to get a bomb.
- match 9 cubes to earn a color wheel
- combine boosts to get bigger effects that so you can solve the puzzle in no time!

title: دليل الصيدلي الناجح
description:
هذا التطبيق يعتمد في معلوماته الدوائية والمرضية على كتاب " دليل الصيدلي الناجح "
 والذي بدوره يعتمد على معلومات كتاب BNF ومعلومات تطبيق Medscape 
وهي معلومات محدثة وفق أحدث الاصدارات ،لذلك يمكن الاعتماد عليها والوثوق بها .

الاسئلة في هذا التطبيق كان الهدف الاساس من كتابتها هو نقل معلومة بأسلوب مختلف عن النقل المباشر للمعلومة 
لذلك فلم يكن في الحسبان أن نختبر بل نرفد ذاكرتك بمزيد من المعلومات وستلاحظ ذلك واضحا في طبيعة الاسئلة .

أن شاء الله سيتم رفد هذا التطبيق وبصورة متواصلة بأسئلة متنوعة في مختلف فصول علم الادوية Pharmacology وهذه هي النقطة التي سنتميز بها عن بقية التطبيقات العلمية الالكترونية .

التطبيق موجه بالدرجة الاساس للصيادلة الجدد وطلبة التدريب الصيفي ،
وهذا ما ستعرفه من خلال طبيعة الاسئلة ومعلوماتها التي هي من أهم الامور المطلوب من الصيدلي المتدرب التركيز عليها أثناء التطبيق الصيفي .

هذا التطبيق وغيره من النشاطات العلمية على مواقع الانترنت المختلفة هدفنا منها هو التقرب الى الله بعمل الخير ،لعل ذلك يكون هو من زادنا في العالم الاخر ويكفر عن ذنوبنا وخطايانا .
والله من وراء القصد .

الصيدلاني : أياد حميد
descriptionHTML:
هذا التطبيق يعتمد في معلوماته الدوائية والمرضية على كتاب " دليل الصيدلي الناجح "
والذي بدوره يعتمد على معلومات كتاب BNF ومعلومات تطبيق Medscape
وهي معلومات محدثة وفق أحدث الاصدارات ،لذلك يمكن الاعتماد عليها والوثوق بها .

الاسئلة في هذا التطبيق كان الهدف الاساس من كتابتها هو نقل معلومة بأسلوب مختلف عن النقل المباشر للمعلومة
لذلك فلم يكن في الحسبان أن نختبر بل نرفد ذاكرتك بمزيد من المعلومات وستلاحظ ذلك واضحا في طبيعة الاسئلة .

أن شاء الله سيتم رفد هذا التطبيق وبصورة متواصلة بأسئلة متنوعة في مختلف فصول علم الادوية Pharmacology وهذه هي النقطة التي سنتميز بها عن بقية التطبيقات العلمية الالكترونية .

التطبيق موجه بالدرجة الاساس للصيادلة الجدد وطلبة التدريب الصيفي ،
وهذا ما ستعرفه من خلال طبيعة الاسئلة ومعلوماتها التي هي من أهم الامور المطلوب من الصيدلي المتدرب التركيز عليها أثناء التطبيق الصيفي .

هذا التطبيق وغيره من النشاطات العلمية على مواقع الانترنت المختلفة هدفنا منها هو التقرب الى الله بعمل الخير ،لعل ذلك يكون هو من زادنا في العالم الاخر ويكفر عن ذنوبنا وخطايانا .
والله من وراء القصد .

الصيدلاني : أياد حميد
summary: This application is based on his pharmacological and pathological information on the book "Directory of Successful Pharmacists"
recentChanges: النسخة الأولى

title: PuzzleGram - Photo Puzzle App Picture Puzzle Game
description:
Share image puzzles with your friends. You can take a photo from the app or upload one from your gallery. 

This app provides countless hours of fun puzzles that can be shared with anyone you know.

With PuzzleGram you can turn a picture into a puzzle in just seconds. 

Once you have a puzzle stored in your Puzzle Gallery, you can share a special link to it on social media, chat applications, text message, email or more with your friends. 

When your friends solve the puzzle you will receive a notification and see how long it took for your puzzle to be solved.

There are currently 4 puzzle options available. 

Free: 
3x3 grid - Wimpy... It might take 10-20 seconds to solve

Paid (unlimited access to all 3 puzzle grids for only $0.99): 
4x4 grid - Ordinary... It might take a minute or so.
6x6 grid - Tough... It might take a few minutes or more.
10x10 grid - Insane... Hold on! It might take hours!

-In-App Purchase Details-

The one-time $0.99 in-app purchase allows for unlimited, lifetime access to the PuzzleGram 1.0 release with the standard 4x4, 6x6 and 10x10 grids. In-app purchases will be applied to future app updates.

• In-App Purchase Title: Unlock All Difficulties (4x4, 6x6, & 10x10 grids)
• Terms of use: https://www.puzzlegram.app/terms-service/
• Privacy policy: https://www.puzzlegram.app/privacy/

-Disclaimer-

Downloading, installing, and using the PuzzleGram app releases PuzzleGram from any liabilities relating to the data/content/images shared using PuzzleGram.

title: HexBlock - Puzzle Game
description:
The task seems simple:
All blocks must be together in the hexagon pattern.

The execution becomes more and more difficult:
Just drag the shapes onto the card.
But beware: they all have to fit!
Rising levels mean more complex shapes and patterns.
Can you do it all?

Train your brain with exciting and constantly new tasks.
Hundreds of levels
Exciting puzzle game with forms for in between
Help function for the little help in between

title: Color Tiles
description: Tap & drag to lay down all the available tiles in adjacent positions, in the order they appear. You can move up, down, left and right while you're laying them down to make a shape that works best for you. When you’ve got at least 4 tiles of the same color (either in a row or touching in any way), they’ll turn into hearts and disappear! Keep the board as clean as possible to get the highest score. When the board fills up the game is over.

title: Locked Escape Game
description:
Locked Escape Game is a hardcore escape game for those who love to solve puzzles, find hints, use objects, combine objects and much more.
each level of the game is designed to make you wander the scene looking for clues and hints, objects and solutions to escape the room.
you also gain score per each room you escape, the faster and fewer taps, the better score you will have.
if you are among the hardcore escapers do not use the skip level button, for everyone else feel free to skip the room after 200 seconds.

How to play :
- tap on the scene to find zooms, objects, puzzles, and hints.
- pay attention to the details, the least object you expect could be what you need to escape.
- solve number puzzles, logical puzzles, sequence puzzles, lever puzzles.
- there is sometimes a secret to escaping the room faster if you are a hardcore gamer.
- the door is always your last obstacle.

can you escape the rooms fast enough? try locked escape game for free and see if you are up to the challenge.

title: Classic Rubik’s Cube
description:
Classic Rubik’s Cube is a game that relies on concentration and thoroughness. There are several benefits of playing Rubik’s cubes games which good for our brains. But playing Rubik’s cube is also not easy because you have to concentrate in order to finish the right color arrangement. There are also techniques you should know in order to make them right. This  cube game can be done by anyone and all ages. This is one of a puzzle games that is simple because only using Rubik’s cube then you can do it.

For all puzzle lovers we offer:

-  Keep your brain sharp with Rubik’s Cube game;
- Choose your own difficulty level: 2x2x2, 3x3x3, 4x4x4, and 8x8x8 Rubik’s Cube;
- Rubik’s Cube timer option: play against time!
- Easy navigation;
- User-friendly interface;
- Help option with tips on how to solve Rubik’s Cube.

Classic Rubik’s Cube is a puzzle game in the form of a cube that has 6 colors, namely (yellow, red, blue, orange, green, white) and six sides. This game greatly can hone our brain’s ability to imagine. For those of you who really like puzzle and mind games that rely on the ability of the brain, this is one game you can do besides playing chess. Without realizing it turns out this rubik’s cube solver will train our brain intelligence. For those of you who want to know what benefits we can get from this puzzle game, you should keep reading this article. Therefore, let us look them below!

 Great memory trainer 

For those of you who are forgetful, this will be very inconvenient and disturbing. Apparently, by playing Rubik’s Cube game, this can help improve one’s memory. Your memory will be more powerful and increase because you have to memorize many formulas to solve it. You can practice as often as possible to help strengthen your memory.

Coaching Patience

Our patience will be tested at the time of Rubik’s Cube play, especially when playing its using logic without using formula, definitely annoying. But there our patience will be trained. Usually, people who just learned to play Rubik’s Cube puzzle game within 15 minutes gave up. So, This is good for you emotional type of person, you can practice more patiently in solving the problem.

Useful time killer

Filling in free time using Rubik’s Cube is the right thing. For example, if you are resting at work or school you can play this one because Rubik’s Cube app is an easy thing to carry. In addition, when you are bored and no work, this puzzle game you can play to eliminate your saturation. Rubik’s Cube app can take you anywhere, so when you’re bored or have free time, play this logic games.

Improve short-term memory

Another benefit of Rubik’s Cube games is to maintain short-term memory. In addition to Rubik’s Cube, complementing crossword, puzzles, board games and chess, Rubik cube also has the same benefits. For those of you who have trouble remembering something that has not happened recently or in the short term, try to play this. This is very effective to help improve memory in your brain.

Increase concentration

Rubik’s Cube game also helps in increasing concentration. Notice how your kids should concentrate on choosing the fastest way to finish the ruby. This cube game requires high concentration and special. If you are having trouble concentrating, this is the right puzzle games for you. Concentration is necessary for everything, so if you are having trouble concentrating then it can be difficult for yourself. Therefore try to increase your concentration by doing this game.

Let’s play Rubik’s Cube to get the best effect for yourself right now! Those benefits of playing Rubik’s cubes above may you get if you playing this game.

title: Jigsaw Puzzle – USA America Puzzles - USA Game
description:
Have you ever been to USA? If the answer is no then this is the game for you. Even if your answer is yes you can play this game to check and refresh your memories.
So relax and enjoy amazing puzzle designs with beautiful pictures of famous historical monuments and places to visit in USA.

There is no better way to know about USA than by playing USA Puzzle game.
Jigsaw Puzzle- USA America Puzzle is a new and innovative way of learning about famous places of USA by placing their pictures in correct order.

This puzzle game allows you to share beautiful pictures of USA along with USA quotes with your loved ones.

This is not your ordinary puzzle game - it's much, much more!
It helps you along the path of self-learning with the help of framed puzzles, which will help you to learn where pieces fit together. Helps you to apply your mind and skill. 
This puzzle game ranges from simple puzzles to complex puzzles, providing fun for all ages. It develops memory, problem solving skills and logical skills as well as entertains us. It’s a great game for all. 

This game takes us on a tour of USA.

How to play:
Touch and drag to align the jigsaw piece to the right place. Rearrange all the pieces to complete the entire image. Use peek button to preview the original image. The more you play, the harder the puzzle gets! 
You can select difficulty level by choosing from 4 to 49 pieces.
Features: - 
* Family friendly puzzle game.
* Puzzle with HD wallpapers of beautiful and famous monuments and places of USA.
* 3 different game modes:
    -classic
    -slide
    -swap
* Every puzzle is unique.
* Simple and easy to play.
* Amazing graphics and relaxing soundtrack.
* Amazing collection of famous places of USA.
* Allows you to share photos along with quotes with your loved ones.
* Simple interface.
* Easy movement of pieces across the screen.
* Suitable for all ages.
* Perfect brain exercise.
* Entertaining puzzles which will keep you busy for hours.
* Play whenever and wherever you want to play.
* Increases you concentration.

Below are the important locations covered in this game.

1) usa president 
2) usa president  home white house
3) important usa tourist points and many more.

So the best way to build your logical skills is to play Jigsaw Puzzles. 
This amazing jigsaw puzzle game has everything you need to train your brain and logical skills.

title: Slicy!
description:
Slicy! is a challenging yet fun logic game. Just lay back and start your brain workout with this super addictive puzzle game.

The goal is to clear the board by completing 4 blocks one after the other. Exercise your mind while feeling relieved by magnetic gameplay and chain reactions.

Now it is your turn to find and explode quadruple pieces as much as possible with using the slicer power smartly. Let’s see if you can beat the high score!

Features;

- Magnetic Gameplay- Each piece draws the missing part in puzzle- makes it easy when completing 4 pieces together.

- Slicer Power - Little pieces divide big pieces into two and destroy other pieces while going through the empty piece.

- Chain Reaction - Helps to clear board while little pieces start to affect each other.

- Complete 4 - Earn the maximum points with completing quadruple pieces.

title: Pixel Color
description:
Relax and enjoy Pixel Color, where you can follow a numbered pattern to paint Mandalas, Princesses, Animals, Food, Cars and Monsters among others.

A new drawing will be available every day, so don’t forget to log in and chill.

A game like Pixel Color is especially useful for kids, who can develop their motor skills while learning to recognize colors and numbers. However, adults can play the game to let off some steam and relax. It’s very easy to do so – each pixel is assigned a number that matches a color you must choose to complete the illustration.

Can you make pieces of art by coloring every pixel? It was never this easy! Choose your favorite drawing and start painting!

title: Kitty Puzzlegram - tangram jigsaw
description:
Drag and drop puzzle pieces to complete the cute cat pictures!  This game is like a combination of tangram and jigsaw puzzles.

You're presented with puzzle pieces, resembling tangram pieces, made from cute cat and kitten pictures.  The goal of the game of the game is to arrange the pieces to form a complete picture.  Simply drag the pieces from the tray and put them on the correct spot on the picture frame.  There's a green rectangle to guide the placement.  Obviously You can always move the pieces if you made a mistake.  Simply tap and drag the pieces to move and rearrange them, or drop them back to the tray.

Features:
- 100 puzzles to solve.  The difficulty level increases as you progress through each levels.  All levels free to play, no purchase required.
The higher levels has more pieces, thus more challenging to solve.
- Over 50 cute, beautiful cat and kitty pictures.
- Relaxing game-play with soothing music and no timer.
- Colorful graphics, ambient sound effects, special particle effects.
- Bonus 3D kitty mascot in the title screen.  Watch the mascot kitty do some cool things.
- Each level is rated by how many number of moves you took to solve the puzzle.  Solve the puzzles with fewest number of moves. Replay the puzzles and try to improve your star ratings.
 
So what are you waiting for?  If you love cats, kittens, tangram or jigsaw, then give this app a try.

title: New 2048 Super 2019
description:
Join New 2048 Super 2018 Puzzle Game

This 2048 new 2019 game is an upgraded version of the original popular 2048 classic app. It not only has classic (4x4) board size, but also supports big (5x5) board sizes. It’s a really super 2048 new 2019 Game Be prepared for a new challenge for best record!

HOW TO PLAY: 
Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two with the same number touch, they merge into one. After every swipe, a new tile will appear in a random empty spot on the board. Slide the cells to merge them, 2+2=4, 4+4=8, 8+8=16, 16+16=32 ... 64 ... 128 .. 256 .. 512 .. 1024 ..., when 2048 is created, you win!
When there is no empty spot on the board and no adjacent tiles with the same value, you lose.

FEATURES

- Classic (4x4) and (5x5) board options!
- Super 2048 Plus puzzle game
- Keep playing for High-score after collected 2048 tile
- Game is automatically saved
- Beautiful and simple UI
- High score
- Completely native implementation

FEATURES COMING SOON

- Leaderboard

title: sum
description:
Sum is a 100% free match-three game that takes place on a 6x6 board. The board is filled with tiles valued 1 through 6. Move these tiles around the board to merge them, collect points and create the largest number. It’s a great game for all ages -- from children who are learning numbers to hardcore, competitive players seeking high scores and high tiles.

GAME PLAY

The goal of the game is to swipe tiles into position in order to match three or more identical numbers. This will result in the merger of the identical tiles. After the merger, one tile will remain and increment in value. New tiles will fall onto the board. You keep repeating this until you run out of moves. 

MOVES

You start with 20 moves. Every time you swipe a tile, you lose a move. When your remaining moves reach 0, then the game is over. You gain additional moves if you merge 4 or more tiles. The more tiles you merge with one swipe, the more moves you earn. 

POINTS

Points are determined by the sum of the tiles being merged -- hence the name “sum.” You get additional points if you create chains of mergers. Each chain will reward you with a +1 multiplier. The longer the chains, the higher the multiplier and the more points you’ll earn.

COMMUNITY

Join our communities to receive game updates and also read / share strategies from other players. Feel free to show off your high scores.


Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/sumgame/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sumGameMobile

Twitter: https://twitter.com/sumgamemobile

title: Color Match: Stroop Remix
description:
Color Match: Stroop Remix is a simple, yet challenging color matching game. Give yourself that mini challenge you need in your day, while warming up your brain at the same time.

Can be picked up and played at any moment to test your mind. Broaden your inner color spectrum as you push your brain and fingers to their limit. Get distracted, and you might make a mistake!

Color Match: Stroop Remix takes the Stroop Test and gives it a twist. Give your brain the work out it needs while enjoying a soothing tapping experience, from the comfort of your phone. Set the game theme to your current gaming mood and get ready to beat the timer with each match. Get distracted and you might make a mistake; perfect your ability to stay focused on a singular task and ignore any 3rd party distractions.

There are 3 game modes:
Match Color: Match the color of the displayed text with the correctly colored button.
Match Name: Match the color name that is displayed with the correctly colored button.
Does it Match: A fast paced, tap-filled game that will get you questioning each and every tap at the last second. If the top and bottom buttons have the same color, press the bottom button; else, press the top button.

Features:
- In-game store to customize your game play with unlockable themes that come with different color palettes.
- 3 game modes (Match Color, Match Name, Does it Match).
- 3 difficulties (Easy-Peasy, Medium Spice, Habanero Hot).
- 2 game types (No Time Limit, Time Limit)

Highlights
- Challenging.
- Broaden your color spectrum.
- Test your reaction time.
- Train yourself to stay on task; any distractions will cause failure.
- Play in-style with in-game themes.
- 3 game modes to change up mental workout.
- Easy pick up and play.

Download Color Match: Stroop Remix today and begin giving your brain that fast action work out it needs!

title: 2048 Puzzle Game
description:
Be ready to play most addictive and super cool game 2048 puzzle game. 2048 Puzzle game  helps you to be master in maths calculations. Just join numbers and get bigger tiles 2048. 2048 is not last you can still play in endless mode.

*HOW TO PLAY?*

Just swipe up, down, left, right to move the tiles. Join two tiles with same number and get sum of it.
For example : 
When tile of 2 meet another tile of 2, new tile 4 will be created. You can merge same number tiles to get sum of it. 
2 + 2 = 4
4 + 4 = 8
8 + 8 = 16
.....
.....
1024 + 1024 = 2048 

Hurray! You win!

2048 is not last number. You can still play in endless mode.

*Features*

- Multiple board size available (3x3, 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 8x8)
- Automatic Save
- Only single undo available
- Colorful design
- 2048 most addictive game
- Trending Puzzle Game

One of the most trending addictive puzzle game "2048 Puzzle Game".

title: Galactic Monsters
description:
Do you like color puzzles? Or looking for a groundbreaking puzzle game? Then you MUST try Galactic Monsters!

THE GAME

Galactic monsters is a revolutionary color puzzle game which implies dragging the monsters to their right color square or creating color clusters, depending on the game mode you choose.

This breakthrough puzzle includes infinite levels generated by the game’s Artificial Intelligence making the game board size grow as levels go by. The number of movements is also generated by the A.I. ensuring that there will always be moves enough to overcome the level.

This crowning way of proceeding makes a game that never ends can be real. Indeed! Game levels are INFINITE!

THE LEADS

There are three kinds of monster each with their own and particular allowed movements.

Rook Monster: It can be moved perpendicularly. It means both vertical and horizontal, like a tower does in a chess game.
Bishop Monster: It can be moved diagonally. Like a bishop does in a chess game.
Queen Monster: It can be moved in all directions like a queen does in a chess game.

However, monsters can be moved in directions they cannot go only when pushed by another monster, e. g. If a Bishop Monster swaps its position with a Rook Monster, this one will have to move diagonally to change the position even if it cannot do that move by itself.

This simple but breathtaking game will make you feel the thrill of testing your puzzle skills while you enjoy your journeys dragging monsters around.

WHAT ABOUT THE UPDATES

We are working on a new game mode based on a customized level editor where users will be able to create their levels and dare other players to overcome them! At the same time, the game’s website version is being built in order to play directly from the web! Does not that sound good?

Help the monsters reach the color they belong to!

This breakthrough puzzle includes infinite levels generated by the game’s Artificial Intelligence making the game board size grow as levels go by. The number of movements is also generated by the A.I. ensuring that there will always be moves enough to overcome the level.

This crowning way of proceeding makes a game that never ends can be real. Indeed! Game levels are INFINITE!

THE LEADS

There are three kinds of monster each with their own and particular allowed movements.

Rook Monster: It can be moved perpendicularly. It means both vertical and horizontal, like a tower does in a chess game.
Bishop Monster: It can be moved diagonally. Like a bishop does in a chess game.
Queen Monster: It can be moved in all directions like a queen does in a chess game.

However, monsters can be moved in directions they cannot go only when pushed by another monster, e. g. If a Bishop Monster swaps its position with a Rook Monster, this one will have to move diagonally to change the position even if it cannot do that move by itself.

This simple but breathtaking game will make you feel the thrill of testing your puzzle skills while you enjoy your journeys dragging monsters around.

WHAT ABOUT THE UPDATES

We are working on a new game mode based on a customized level editor where users will be able to create their levels and dare other players to overcome them! At the same time, the game’s website version is being built in order to play directly from the web! Does not that sound good?

Help the monsters reach the color they belong to!
summary: Help the monsters reach the color they belong to!
recentChanges:
1. Improving levels' difficulty increments (Adjusting the algorithms and Artificial Intelligence).
2. Warning players when game board size increases
3. Warning players when a new protagonist will probably appear
4. Improving game tutorials, especially on the first levels to be able to get used to playing quickly
5. Improving Game Play basics
6. Super Combo involving extra reward when users overcome a level using fewer moves than those considered 'Perfect'

ENJOY!

Welcome to the flower Garden, the best free match 3 adventure saga with the greatest challenges! Download it right now to step into this flower land of beauty.

Start this unlimited free fun, swapping, switching and matching 3 or more pretty flowers in vertical or horizontal lines to blast and crush them.

Flower Mania is not just another flower match 3 game available for your mobile phone; it provides a different and challenging experience with its crazy quests. You’ll be blasting the blossom flowers in new cool ways by swapping power ups together in this mania game adventure. Match as many flowers as possible to get bigger more effective blossom power up blasts and explosions. 

How to Play:
Touch and swap or swipe a flower to match 3 or more same colored flowers to crush and blast them. Match them in horizontal or vertical lines and they’ll be crushed. Remember you’ll have a limit to the number of moves or time to clear each level in this flower frenzy mania, so be quick but make sure to think. Move wisely, think ahead and complete your target to clear the level and proceed to the next one. Think of it as chess, sometimes it is better to predict where a piece will be next to create a powerful power up.

title: Match 2 Kill: Match 3 Action Puzzle
description:
Do you like match 3 puzzles and zombie shooting games? You're gonna love this original take on the puzzle genre.

Make no mistake, Match 2 Kill is the best match 3 action puzzle game you could ever have hoped for. Yes, we know you are an expert at matching candies. And that getting three jewels in a row holds no secrets to you. No one's arguing that. But it won't be worth much here! Strategy & skill required!

STORY:

Oh my goodness! This is messed up! 😱

Join Chloe and Ryan in their adventure through the most spooky places as you help them exceed the different goals in each one of the game's challenging levels. We warn you now, it's not going to be easy: the levels are infested with scary but cute zombies eager to sink their teeth into our heroes!

You'll barely have time to catch your breath! Those little zombie monsters won't let you take it easy, you'll have to think fast! Swap and match the board tiles in order to defend yourself, heal your heroes, or enhance your fire power in really frenetic battles. And remember to leverage your boosters, they may eventually tip the balance in your favor! Now, forget about turns: everything works REAL-TIME here. Match 2 Kill is the ultimate match 3 action puzzle game!

And even though you may sometimes feel like playing on your own, you'll be able to share the experience with your friends and loved ones while you all compete for the highest score. Never has a zombie apocalypse been so much fun!

TOURNAMENTS:

Would you like some more? Match 2 Kill also offers very addictive online tournaments where you'll be able to compete against your friends and the rest of the community in a survival game mode in which you have to get the highest score while your heroes stay alive for a certain amount of time.

These are ranked tournaments where an Elo rating system helps build a global ranking and places players into one of multiple rank tiers. Furthermore, each tournament awards trophies and juicy prizes: intense rivalry guaranteed!

And we have saved the best for last! Match 2 Kill is a completely FREE match 3 action puzzle game. It's free to download and play (and you will be rewarded with free daily bonuses!) but some in-game items may be purchased with real money to help you and enhance your gaming experience. Download it now and try this new and exciting brain teaser! 📲

FEATURES:

✔️ BEAUTIFUL HD GRAPHICS with cartoon style, cute zombies and spooky, catchy music themes.
✔️ FAST-PACED REAL-TIME ACTION: no turns and no limited number of moves.
✔️ Three different and FRIGHTENING GAME MODES, each with its own set of goals and super addictive gameplay.
✔️ DISTINCT ZOMBIE ENEMIES that will force you to stay alert, each with their individual behavior and attack patterns.
✔️ Use different types of COMBINATIONS (match 4 or 5 gems in different shapes) to trigger DEVASTATING drilling and incendiary attacks, or to protect yourself with invulnerability and regeneration.
✔️ HISTORY mode with lots of INTERESTING, CHALLENGING LEVELS with dozens of different pieces and gameplay mechanics.
✔️ TOURNEYS mode with RANKED MULTIPLAYER TOURNAMENTS, rank tiers, prizes and a global ranking of all players.
✔️ COLLECT AWESOME BOOSTERS in the DAILY BONUS WHEEL to keep those zombie hordes at bay.
✔️ Login with FACEBOOK so you can sync your progress across your mobile phones or tablets and preserve it between installations, and COMPETE against your FRIENDS for each level's best score.

We're always listening to your suggestions to improve Match 2 Kill. If you have any issue with the game, just contact us and we will help you: contact@codepirinha.com 📧.

In addition, you can follow us on social networks to stay abreast of news:
http://facebook.com/codepirinha
http://twitter.com/codepirinha

Probably the best scary match 3 action puzzle game in the world today.
CodePirinha 🍹 wishes you a screamingly funny adventure! 🌃

And we have saved the best for last! Match 2 Kill is a completely FREE match 3 action puzzle game. It's free to download and play (and you will be rewarded with free daily bonuses!) but some in-game items may be purchased with real money to help you and enhance your gaming experience. Download it now and try this new and exciting brain teaser! 📲

FEATURES:

✔️ BEAUTIFUL HD GRAPHICS with cartoon style, cute zombies and spooky, catchy music themes.
✔️ FAST-PACED REAL-TIME ACTION: no turns and no limited number of moves.
✔️ Three different and FRIGHTENING GAME MODES, each with its own set of goals and super addictive gameplay.
✔️ DISTINCT ZOMBIE ENEMIES that will force you to stay alert, each with their individual behavior and attack patterns.
✔️ Use different types of COMBINATIONS (match 4 or 5 gems in different shapes) to trigger DEVASTATING drilling and incendiary attacks, or to protect yourself with invulnerability and regeneration.
✔️ HISTORY mode with lots of INTERESTING, CHALLENGING LEVELS with dozens of different pieces and gameplay mechanics.
✔️ TOURNEYS mode with RANKED MULTIPLAYER TOURNAMENTS, rank tiers, prizes and a global ranking of all players.
✔️ COLLECT AWESOME BOOSTERS in the DAILY BONUS WHEEL to keep those zombie hordes at bay.
✔️ Login with FACEBOOK so you can sync your progress across your mobile phones or tablets and preserve it between installations, and COMPETE against your FRIENDS for each level's best score.

We're always listening to your suggestions to improve Match 2 Kill. If you have any issue with the game, just contact us and we will help you: contact@codepirinha.com 📧.

In addition, you can follow us on social networks to stay abreast of news:
http://facebook.com/codepirinha
http://twitter.com/codepirinha

Probably the best scary match 3 action puzzle game in the world today.
CodePirinha 🍹 wishes you a screamingly funny adventure! 🌃
